programme.desc: Its decision time on Great British Menu Does Comic Relief for the chefs representing Wales. One chef left the competition and only two remain, who will cook their entire menus for the Great British Menu judges, Prue Leith, Matthew Fort and Oliver Peyton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Three returning contenders from the North East are reunited in a culinary rematch. Colin McGurran, Stephanie Moon and Charlie Lakin. The three North East chefs will be judged by a veteran of the competition Michelin star chef Jason Atherton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: In todays programme the chefs cook their fish courses. Will former champion Colin McGurrans dish inspired by his childhood memories, Cockles and Mussels with Salmon inspire veteran judge Jason Atherton?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the turn of three chefs from Northern Ireland - Chris Fearon, Raymond McArdle, and Ian Orr - who will be judged by a veteran of the competition Michelin star chef Glynn Purnell.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The three Northern Ireland chefs cook their fish course. Chris Fearon serves up a creation called Stitched up like a kipper, Raymond McArdle serves Turbot called A day at the beach and Ian Orr creates a dish called Why did the scallop cross the roe.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its time for the main course. Chris Fearons dish called Cowboy supper is inspired by the Wild West. Raymond McArdle creates a dish called Titanic smoked venison, tongue and cheek while Ian Orr cooks lamb and baked hay.

programme.desc: Today is the chefs last chance to impress before the final two chefs are chosen to face the Great British Menu judging panel. Which dessert will help get two chefs through?

programme.desc: Its decision time for the chefs from Northern Ireland. One chef left the competition and only two remain, who will cook their entire menus for the Great British Menu judges, Prue Leith, Matthew Fort and Oliver Peyton.

programme.sub-title: S08 : E36 London and South East Starter
programme.desc: The curtain raises on London and the South East - newcomers Matt Gillan and Adam Simmonds come face-to-face with returning contender Tom Aikens. Today its the starter course and someone makes a schoolboy error.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: S08 : E37 London and South East Fish
programme.desc: Today its the fish course and Tom and Matt battle it out with scallop dishes while Adam delivers Langoustine and Oysters. But who will come out on top?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: S08 : E38 London and South East Main
programme.desc: Today its the main course. Rabbit, Rose veal and venison are all dished up for Great British Menu veteran Richard Corrigan. And one of the chefs is joined by Eastenders star June Brown for a fundraising challenge.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: S08 : E39 London and South East Dessert
programme.desc: Today its the dessert course, will a strawberry and coconut dessert, a frozen white chocolate dish or apple and cherries come out on top. Great British Menu veteran judge Richard Corrigan will decide who goes through to the judges.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: S08 : E40 London and South East Judging
programme.desc: Its decision time on Great British Menu Does Comic Relief for the chefs from London and the South East. One chef left the competition and only two remain, who will cook their entire menus for the judges, Prue Leith, Matthew Fort and Oliver Peyton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Actress Patricia Hodge, one of the stars of sit com Miranda will join judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort to taste all eight winning regional starter courses.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The chefs cook their fish courses. Theyre all vying to finish in the top three and still be in with a chance of cooking at the special banquet.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Comedian Ade Edmondson tucks into the chefs main courses to help decide which three will remain in contention to cook at the special banquet. But the chefs are in for a major surprise as the judges deliver unexpected news about the days competition.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its judgement day as the chefs not only learn the top three desserts but the judges announce the winning menu. Fast show writer and performer Charlie Higson helps judge the puddings.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the climax of the competition as the winning chefs cook at the Comic Relief Banquet at the Royal Albert Hall. But its not plain sailing - the chefs have to contend with getting into the kitchen late.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: This week three newcomers to the competition, Stevie McLaughlin, Jacqueline ODonnell and Neil Rankin go head to head to represent Scotland. Today they must impress the mystery veteran judge with their starter courses.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The Scottish chefs, double Michelin starred Stevie McLaughlin, experienced Jacqueline ODonnell and newcomer Neil Rankin fight it out for the fish course. After yesterdays upset which chef will deliver with a dish which hits the brief?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the main course for Scottish chefs Stevie McLaughlin, Jacqueline ODonnell and Neil Rankin. Which chef will receive the ultimate accolade from the veteran judge?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the dessert course and the Scottish chefs fates hang in the balance as at the end of today, one of them must be sent home. For Stevie McLaughlin, Jacqueline ODonnell and Neil Rankin theres no room for error.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the two remaining Scottish chefs fight it out for just one place in the finals, cooking all four of their dishes again for judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Three of the South Wests finest chefs, returning contender Emily Watkins, experienced Dominic Chapman and newcomer Josh Eggleton fight it out. Today they must cook their starter courses to be judged by the surprise veteran judge.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the South West chefs, returner Emily Watkins and Michelin starred Dominic Chapman and Josh Eggleton do battle for the fish course.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The South West chefs Emily Watkins, Dominic Chapman and Josh Eggleton cook their main courses for the veteran judge. With the competition so tight can one of them pull out in front before tomorrows deciding dessert course?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the dessert course and the South West chefs last chance to secure a place in tomorrows regional final. Two will make it through to cook their menus for the judges.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.desc: This week three of Wales top chefs, returning contender Mary Ann Gilchrist, former military man David Kelman and fellow newcomer Andy Beaumont compete for a place in the finals.

programme.desc: Three of Northern Irelands top chefs, returning finalist Raymond McArdle, Richard Corrigans protg Chris McGowan and young gun Will Brown go head to head. Today they must impress this weeks mystery veteran judge with their starter courses.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 48, 49
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP17-20
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Three Bullets ... For a Long Gun
programme.desc: Nobody knows his true name, but everybody knows he is the Major, and that when he wants something, he gets it.

programme.title: Savage Pampas
programme.desc: In the late 1800s, an army captain tries to tame the open plains of Argentina which are dominated by Indians and bandits. To help do this, the captain brings in a party of women to keep his soldiers happy.

programme.title: The White, the Yellow, and the Black
programme.desc: In the 19th century, when the Japanese Emperor sends a gift pony to the US President it gets stolen and ransomed by Indians but Sheriff Gideon aided by an inept Japanese servant offers to deliver the ransom.

programme.title: In a Colts Shadow
programme.desc: A story about two gunfighters, Duke and Steve. Steve is in love with Dukes daughter but Duke disapproves of the match, envisioning a life of hardship and danger for the girl if she marries Steve.

programme.title: Five Guns West
programme.desc: Shalee Jethro (Dorothy Malone) helps her father run a desert stagecoach station.

programme.title: Go with God, Gringo
programme.desc: Framed for his brother’s murder by the Cris brothers, Gringo lands in prison with a friend. When the real killers escape and abduct Carmen, he must survive daring adventures to prove his innocence and rescue her.

programme.title: Four Fast Guns
programme.desc: A gunslinger rides into Purgatory, claiming to be the town tamer they hired—though he killed the real one. For $500, payable to a widow of his victim, he takes on the towns wheelchair-bound crime boss. The outlaw fights to free the town while facing three hired killers sent to eliminate him, testing his resolve and his skill as lawman-for-hire.

programme.title: Patience Has a Limit, We Dont
programme.desc: During the Civil War, Corporal MacDonald hides a large gold shipment meant for the Union. Before he can retrieve it, hes killed—taking the secret location with him. Now, a Union lieutenant and MacDonalds two sons compete to uncover the buried treasure in a tense hunt filled with danger and deception.

programme.title: I Am Sartana, Trade Your Guns for a Coffin
programme.desc: Sartana, a bounty hunter and gunfighter, witnesses a gold robbery and arrives in a suspicious town run by Samuel Spencer. Hired to protect the next shipment, Sartana fends off numerous incompetent villains, surviving their attempts on his life. Meanwhile, his nemesis, Sabbath—known for his white coat and parasol—arrives in town. With tensions rising, Sartana and Sabbath are headed for a final showdown to settle the score.

programme.title: Gunman of One Hundred Crosses
programme.desc: An Irishman is killed in the wild West. His son Jimmy goes out searching for the killers of his father, but is soon ambushed by two highwaymen, and killed, too.

programme.title: A Town Called Hell
programme.desc: A group of Mexican revolutionaries murders a town priest and a number of his christian followers. Ten years later, a widow arrives in town intent to take revenge from her husbands killers.

programme.title: Silent Thunder
programme.desc: With the help of two bank robbers, a US Marshal sets out to rescue five prostitutes who have been abducted by a gang of desert dwelling, otherworldly, monsters

programme.title: The Glory Guys
programme.desc: What could be worse for two cavalry officers than to battle with native tribes? To battle each other for the same woman.

programme.title: Six Bounty Killers for a Massacre
programme.desc: The Governor of Kansas hires six gunfighters to overthrow the tyrannical rule of the self-appointed sheriff of Abilene who is holding several hostages including his family.

programme.title: Three Graves for a Winchester
programme.desc: Ringo Carson has a tough life. First, he has a falling out with his best friend, Frank Sanders, after saving Jane, the girl he loves, from Mexican kidnappers in order to extort a ransom from her gunrunner father.

programme.title: Beyond The Law
programme.desc: A trio of thieves plot to steal a towns silver shipment but a turn of events makes them the towns heroes.

programme.title: The Counterfeit Kid
programme.desc: Jack, a simple farmhand must get help from a group of wild misfits and find treasure before the outlaw hes been impersonating finds him.

programme.title: Sugar Colt
programme.desc: In order to avenge a friend and to fulfill his last wish, Rocco has to find out what happened to an army corps that has mysteriously disappeared. He therefore puts on the disguise of a doctor and starts investigating in a somewhat uncomfortable town.

programme.title: Buckaroo: The Winchester Does Not Forgive
programme.desc: The Winchester Does Not Forgive - When the stagecoach in which they travel is attacked by Monteiros gang, Lash accepts to kill his friend to save his bacon.

programme.title: Those Dirty Dogs
programme.desc: Near Fort Apache, Mexican bandits raid a U.S. Army supply column, killing soldiers and kidnapping Miss Adams. To stop the raids, President Grant sends Captain Chadwell, Lieutenant Junger, Sergeant Smith, and bounty hunter Korano. Together, they face outlaw Angelo Sanchez and the mad General Mueller in a dangerous mission.

programme.title: Damned Pistols of Dallas
programme.desc: Outlaw Fast Draw (Álvarez) assaults stagecoach with passengers Clay Stone (Beir), singer Katy Dior (Marandi) and gambler Fred Foster (Mathot), but Stone is ready to take revenge.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: A special agent from Chicago is sent out west to bring in the notorious Reno brothers.

programme.title: China 9, Liberty 37
programme.desc: The railroad hires a condemned killer to murder an uncooperative rancher but the assassin fails to deliver, prompting the railroad men to go after him instead.

programme.title: The Executioner of God
programme.desc: A former gunman turned priest seeks vengeance on three bandits who are masquerading as law-abiding citizens.

programme.title: Daniel Boone, Trail Blazer
programme.desc: Daniel Boone leads settlers to Kentucky, but must fight Shawnee Indians who have been convinced by a French renegade that Boone and the settlers are there to kill them and steal their land.

programme.title: Tequila aka Fuzzy the Hero
programme.desc: Tequila and Bobo hit the little town of Chedron intending to rob the local bank whose owner, De Koven, is trying to freeze out all the ranchers in the area by the simple expedient of foreclosing on the mortgages his bank holds on their land.

programme.title: The Legend of the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The sole surviving Texas Ranger (Klinton Spilsbury) of an ambush arranged by outlaw leader Major Bartholomew "Butch" Cavendish (Christopher Lloyd) returns to fight back as a great masked western hero, The Lone Ranger.

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: Sierra Nevada Jones must fight a villainous rancher to regain the land that is rightfully hers.

programme.title: The Shakiest Gun in the West
programme.desc: A pardoned stagecoach robber, becomes government agent and marries a naive unsuspecting east-coast dentist in order to join a wagon train.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT

programme.desc: Vanessa Hudgens is a megastar known for "High School Musical" and roles in cult movies like "Spring Breakers."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Big Sean and Sean hang out over hot wings. The Detroit emcee discusses ranch life with Kanye West, breaks down hip-hops love of Stan Van Gundy and struggles to maintain his Buddha-like calm.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The Texas Rattlesnake body slams wings and discusses his iconic wrestling career, gives props to The Rock and tells war stories from his years on the road.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Zac Efron takes on the wings of death with Sean Evans, channeling Shia LaBeouf as he pops bottles of hot sauce along the way. From throwback basketball tricks to paparazzi advice from Leonardo DiCaprio, this episode has it all!

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Mila Kunis takes on the wings of death while breaking down NFTs, explaining what its like to have Conan OBrien as a neighbor and fact-checking Ashton Kutchers episode of "Hot Ones."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: With millions of Scovilles coursing through his veins, Rippon shares behind-the-scenes stories from PyeongChang, reveals the magical powers of In-N-Out burgers and judges a very special "Hot Ones" free-skate routine from Sean Evans.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Will Ferrell shares behind-the-scenes stories from his beloved movies and discusses the origins of his famous Harry Caray impersonation on "Saturday Night Live."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: David Blaine is known all over the world for his street magic and endurance stunts, which include being buried alive for seven days and holding his breath underwater for 17 minutes, but how is he with spicy food?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The beloved actor and style icon faces down the vegan wings of death. As he clambers up spice mountain, Jeff Goldblum breaks down "Jurassic Park" lore and discusses his spiritual encounter with Quavo.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Bear Grylls is an adventurer, a best-selling author and the battle-tested host of a number of hit shows, including "Running Wild with Bear Grylls" - but can he defeat the spice?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Quavo follows in the footsteps of Offset and attempts to scale the heights of Mount Scoville, discussing everything from Jeff Goldblum fits to studio sessions with DJ Khaled to partying with Elon Musk along the way.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Pedro Pascal is an actor you know from massive global hits like "Game of Thrones" and "The Last of Us."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Ace Man looks back on his storied career and battles his way through the wings of death. Along the way, the rant king gets going on everything from Kanye West to iced tea to the brilliance of crows.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The "Top Chef" host, model and author goes wing for wing and dab for dab with Sean while discussing everything from her friendship with Shaq to the most appetizing animal testicles in the game.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Hollywood vet Rob Lowe takes on the wings of death and discusses "West Wing" lore, comedy legends and the most overrated Thanksgiving sides.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Michael B. Jordan has the Midas touch with roles like Erik Killmonger, but can he handle the wings of death?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Sean Evans asks one of his broadcasting idols, Jimmy Kimmel, about everything from the enduring influence of David Letterman and Howard Stern to favorite all-time pranks.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The "Man v. Food" veteran knows about spicy food challenges, but how will he fair against the wings of death?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Comedy legend Artie Lange battles through Zombie Apocalypse and Da Bomb, cracking jokes about everything from Kanye West to overzealous touchdown dances along the way.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Bob Odenkirk is an actor and writer whose resume includes everything from the pioneering sketch comedy series "Mr. Show" to "Breaking Bad" and an acclaimed performance as Jimmy McGill in "Better Call Saul."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: With millions of Scovilles coursing through his veins, Rippon shares behind-the-scenes stories from PyeongChang, reveals the magical powers of In-N-Out burgers and judges a very special "Hot Ones" free-skate routine from Sean Evans.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The Rat King takes on the wings of death and chats with Sean Evans as if they were lifelong buddies. Theo talks about climbing Mount Kilimanjaro, capturing chimps in Louisiana and adapting to the L.A. lifestyle.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Tessa Thompson is an actress whose resume runs the gamut from critically acclaimed indies to TV hits to box office-shattering blockbusters, including "Westworld," "Creed" and many more.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: As the Scoville bombs rain down on her tongue, Portman discusses her beloved "SNL" rap performances, her Harvard days and why its cool that Kanye used ballet dancers in his Runaway music video.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Hollywood vet Jeremy Renner takes on the wings of death and discusses off-road racing at the Baja 500, karaoke memories and his deep "man love" for Paul Rudd.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Liza Koshy is one of the internets biggest stars with 25mil subscribers, plus the star of Liza on Demand.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The Charlotte emcee takes on the wings of death in front of a LIVE audience at ComplexCon and discusses everything from his smash hits to his love of Krispy Kreme donuts. Dont miss the iconic hot wing ice cream dunk!

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Can Neil keep his facts straight while battling the heat of Zombie Apocalypse and Mad Dog 357? Tackling everything from Obama selfies to Kanye West lyrics along the way.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Paul Dano is an actor you know from his acclaimed performances in films like "The Batman," "Little Miss Sunshine," "There Will Be Blood" and many more.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Action Bronson is a rapper, chef and NYT best-selling author - and is in the hot seat for a round two.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Halsey discusses her friendship with John Mayer, breaks down spooky New Jersey lore and admits that she was more nervous for "Hot Ones" than her own album release.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: James Corden is the Emmy-winning host of "The Late Late Show with James Corden."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Matt Damon is an Academy Award-winning actor from "Saving Private Ryan," the Bourne film series and more.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Watch rapper Wale break down his relationship with Jerry Seinfeld, crack jokes about his hot-and-cold past with Complex and explain why he doesnt remember meeting Kobe Bryant.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The Texas Rattlesnake body slams wings and discusses his iconic wrestling career, gives props to The Rock and tells war stories from his years on the road.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: How will acting legend Drew Barrymore, who has over 70 film and TV credits to her name, handle hot sauces?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Aubrey Plaza is known for her cult roles in "Scott Pilgrim vs. the World," "Parks and Recreation" and more.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Watch how Matthew McConaughey fares against the wings of death while answering questions about his writing process, what makes romantic comedies work and how helpful New Yorkers really are.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: In between painful fits of laughter, Danny Brown manages to share some top-shelf anecdotes about the Gathering of the Juggalos, 50 Cents fashion tips and his beloved cats.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Lover of anime Thundercat reveals the cartoons with the best theme songs, video game soundtracks, Marvel movies, his bass-playing days with Suicidal Tendencies, his love of bowling and the first time he met Sean in Los Angeles at The Comedy Store.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Davidson offers behind-the-scenes "SNL" stories, talks about walking in an Alexander Wang fashion show and gives a ringing endorsement for "Uncut Gems" and Adam Sandlers basketball skills.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Jon Bernthal is an actor starring in TV shows like "The Walking Dead," but how is he with spicy food?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Austin Butler is a Golden Globe Award-winning actor who is up for an Oscar in this years Best Actor category for his performance in "Elvis," the acclaimed biopic directed by Baz Luhrmann.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: A dear friend of "Hot Ones," Adam Richman, takes on the sauces and wings while discussing his top five iconic Brooklyn eating establishments, the influence of WWII on how Americans eat today, urban gardening tips and his favorite food rap lyrics.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The "White and Nerdy" icon takes on the vegan wings of death. As the Scovilles mount, Weird Al shares anecdotes about meeting Sir Paul McCartney and Michael Jackson and getting co-signed by Kurt Cobain.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Chris Jericho takes on the wings of death with Sean Evans, sharing wrestling BTS tales and top-shelf Bruce Willis anecdotes along the way.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Accurately dubbing "Hot Ones" a "cross between Charlie Rose and f*%king Jackass," the comedian Ricky Gervais gets pummeled by the Zombie Apocalypse and Da Bomb Beyond Insanity.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Salma Hayek is an Academy Award-nominated actress and film producer who is here to conquer the spice.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: E-40 is a hip-hop legend with more than three decades in the game - and he is ready to take on the heat.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Bill Burr is one of the most requested "Hot Ones" guests of all time and a true standup legend.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: "The hottest Hot One" Idris Elba takes on the wings of death and discusses everything from UK hip-hop legends to Cockney rhyming slang.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The comedian discusses tech bros, breaks down his favorite video games and explains his obsession with "The X-Files." Kumail becomes the first guest in "Hot Ones" history to dine with a knife and fork.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Paris discusses bottle service scams, paparazzi evasion tactics, her relationship with the media and the art of sliving (slaying + living) as she takes on the wings of death.

programme.title: Legacy of lies
programme.desc: Kovaotteinen ovimies Martin Baxter tienaa lisatuloja osallistumalla laillisuuden rajamailla pyoriviin taistelulajikisoihin. Takana on ura MI6:n agenttina, jonka han jatti Kiovassa sattuneen katastrofin takia. Mutta menneisyydellahan on taipumusta loytya edesta hanen ammatissaan. Kun Baxter saa tilaisuuden selvittaa, mita Kiovassa tuona kohtalokkaana iltana tapahtui, han tarttuu siihen.

programme.title: Instrument of War
programme.desc: Kun Yhdysvaltain ilmavoimien B-24 pommikoneen pilotti Clair Cline ammutaan alas ja vangitaan Saksassa, hanen osaltaan yksi sota loppuu ja toinen - toivon yllapitaminen - alkaa. Natsien piikkilanka-aitojen saartama Cline ja muut sotavangit etsivat selviamisen lisaksi keinoja peitota vankeus. Perustuu tositapahtumiin.

programme.title: Toivon lahteet
programme.desc: Oltuaan 30 vuotta naimisissa keski-ikainen pariskunta ryhtyy intensiiviseen viikon kestavaan pariterapiaan tyostaakseen parisuhdettaan.

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Hehkuva kaupunki
programme.desc: On kulunut 200 vuotta siita; kun viimeiset ihmiset saivat turvapaikan maanalaisesta Emberin kaupungista; mutta nyt suuri genenaattori on menossa rikki.

programme.title: Death At A Funeral
programme.desc: Danielin ja Robertin isan kuolema saattaa toraisan perheen yhteen suremaan vainajaa. Kun hautajaisiin ilmestyva mies uhkaa paljastaa vainajan jarkyttavan salaisuuden ellei saa rahaa, on veljesten keksittava jotain paastakseen kiristajasta eroon. Seremoniasta sukeutuu taysi kaaos, kun he yrittavat estaa uutisen kantautumisen saattovaen korviin.

programme.title: Vieraampi kuin fiktio
programme.desc: Verohallinnon tarkastaja huomaa yhtakkia olevansa vain hanen kuulemansa kerronnan kohteena: kertomus, joka alkaa vaikuttaa hanen koko elamaansa; hanen tyostaan; hanen rakkautensa; hanen kuolemaansa.

programme.title: Instrument of War
programme.desc: Kun Yhdysvaltain ilmavoimien B-24 pommikoneen pilotti Clair Cline ammutaan alas ja vangitaan Saksassa, hanen osaltaan yksi sota loppuu ja toinen - toivon yllapitaminen - alkaa. Natsien piikkilanka-aitojen saartama Cline ja muut sotavangit etsivat selviamisen lisaksi keinoja peitota vankeus. Perustuu tositapahtumiin.

programme.title: Kirjava huntu (The Painted Veil)
programme.desc: Laakari Walter Fane ja hanen vaimonsa Kitty ovat komennuksella Shanghaissa, jossa Walter on toissa paikallisessa sairaalassa. Walterin vaativa tyo vie kaiken liikenevan ajan ja yksinainen Kitty ajautuu englantilaisen diplomaatin Charles Townsendin syleilyyn. Kun Walter saa tietaa vaimonsa uskottomuudesta, han janoaa kostoa. Walter hyvaksyy vaarallisen tyon kiinalaisessa pikkukylassa, jossa riehuu kuolettava koleraepidemia. Kittylla ei ole muuta mahdollisuutta kuin seurata miestaan maaseudulle kauas kaikesta.

programme.title: Long Story Short
programme.desc: Tama on kertomus Ellenista ja hanen ystavistaan seka heidan enemman tai vahemman itse aiheuttamistaan monimutkaisista rakkauselamistaan ja romanttisista unelmistaan. Kolmen vuoden ajan ystavapiirin parhaat ja huonoimmat rakkaustarinat tiivistyvat ja kerrotaan kahdeksan luvun kautta, joista jokainen sijoittuu eri juhlatilaisuuteen. Ryhma kamppailee taydellisen suhteen idean kanssa ja joutuu arvioimaan uudelleen, mita todellinen rakkaus oikein on.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Don Martellin siloinen elama pyorii perheen, kavereiden ja punttitreenin ymparilla, minka lisaksi han kay uskollisesti kirkossa joka pyha. Kavereidensa ”Don Joniksi” ristima hurmuri iskee baarista pelkkia taydellisia naisia, joista kukaan ei kuitenkaan veda vertoja pornolle. Don joutuu arvioimaan keskenkasvuisia mieltymyksiaan uudestaan, kun han tapaa ihanan Barbaran, jonka kasitys unelmien miehesta ei vastaa lainkaan Donia.

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: Raivokkaassa toisen maailmansodan Saipanin taistelussa kersantti Joe Enders (Nicolas Cage) vartioi – ja ystavystyy – Ben Yahzeen (Adam Beach) kanssa, nuoren navajon, joka on koulutettu kayttamaan ainoaa sodanaikaista koodia, jota vihollinen ei koskaan murtautunut... Navajo-koodia. Mutta jos Yahzee joutuu vihollisen kasiin, kuinka pitkalle Enders on valmis menemaan pelastaakseen armeijan voimakkaimman salaisuuden? John Woo ohjaa taman toimintapitoisen eeppisen elokuvan, joka on saanut innoituksensa navajosotilaiden todellisesta tarinasta, joiden rohkeus ja uhraukset auttoivat voittamaan sodan Tyynellamerella.

programme.title: Keinottelua
programme.desc: Menestyvan liikemiehen Robert Millerin (Gere) taydelliselta vaikuttava elama ajautuu syoksykierteeseen yhden kohtalokkaan erehdyksen seurauksena. Miller loytaa itsensa tasapainoilemasta perhe-elaman, yrityskauppojen, uhkaavan kavallussyytteen ja syrjahypyn ristipaineessa. Saatuaan viela sinnikkaan poliisietsiva Michael Bryerin (Roth) peraansa, joutuu Miller epatoivoiseen kujanjuoksuun yrittaessaan korjata tekemansa virheet ennen kuplan puhkeamista.

programme.title: My Week With Marilyn
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen viikosta Englannissa, jossa han oli kuvaamassa elokuvaa "Prinssi ja revyytytto" hurmaten kaikki niin kameran edessa kuin takanakin. Colin Clarkin kahteen kirjaan perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen ja Laurence Olivierin tahdittaman elokuvan Prinssi ja revyytytto (1957) synnysta. Tarina keskittyy viikkoon, jolloin Clark toimi Marilyn Monroen isantana Englannissa taman miehen Arthur Millerin poistuttua maasta.

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: Eraana kohtalokkaana iltana pienessa englantilaisessa paikallisteatterissa toisen maailmansodan aikana joukko kiertavia nayttelijoita esittaa Shakespearen naytelman "Kuningas Lear".

programme.title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
programme.desc: Vuosi on 1985. Pastellivarien, puutelihiusten ja otsanauhojen aikakautena nuori Janey uneksii tanssijan urasta. Koulua han on ehtinyt vaihtaa jo 11 kertaa, ja han tietaa etta ne eivat muutu miksikaan. Hanen uusimmassa koulussaan on tosin jotain erikoista. Ei se etta se sijaitsee Chicagossa, vaan se etta siella tehdaan suosittua nuoriso-ohjelmaa nimelta Dance TV. Taalla Janey tapaa tanssifriikki Lynnen joka houkuttelee hanet koetanssiin, ja menestyksen ovet alkavat avautua.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Intensiivisessa draamassa seurataan kahta high school -opiskelijaa, Hancockia ja Dannya, heidan valmistumisensa jalkeen. Hancock tyytyy cheerleader-tyttoystavansa kanssa keskiluokkaiseen keskinkertaisuuteen ja etaantyy Dannysta ja taman psykoottisesta vaimosta, Bevista.

programme.title: Elegy
programme.desc: David Kepesh on arvostettu yliopiston professori, jonka maailma jarkkyy, kun hanen luennoilleen ilmestyy kaunis Consuela Castillo. Consuelan kauneus ajaa professorin himon ja omistushalun pyorteeseen, jollaista han ei ole aiemmin kokenut. Mutkikas rakkaustarina saa alkunsa. Perustuu Pulitzer-palkitun Philip Rothin teokseen.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: My Old Lady
programme.desc: New Yorkissa asuva tyhjatasku Mathias perii pariisilaisasunnon isaltaan, jota han ei koskaan tuntenut. Uudessa kiinteistossa Mathiasta odottaa kuitenkin yllatys vanhahkon, sivistyneen rouva Mathilden ja hanen suojelevaisen tyttarensa asuttaessa asuntoa. Ikivanhan ranskalaisen lakipykalan vuoksi omaisuutta ei voi siirtaa perijalle ennen asukkaan, eli Mathilden kuolemaa. Mathias paattaa yrittaa asunnon myymista kaikesta huolimatta, mutta vahitellen selviaa, etta hanen isallaan ja Mathildella on ollut pitkaan yhteinen salaisuus kannettavanaan

programme.title: Passion
programme.desc: Brian De Palman ohjaama ja Rachel McAdamsin ja Noomi Rapacen tahdittama Passion on jannityksen mestarin uusin piinaava trilleri. Isabelle (Rapace) tyoskentelee suuressa mainostoimistossa hyvin tiiviissa yhteistyossa pomonsa Christinen (McAdams) kanssa. Kun Christine yllattaen varastaa Isabellen suunnitteleman mainoskampanjan ja esittelee sen eteenpain omana ideanaan valit muuttuvat hetkessa jaataviksi. Verisesti loukkaantunut Isabelle janoaa raivoissaan kostoa ja askel kerrallaan Christine tulee huomaamaan, etta tassa valtapelissa kaikki keinot ovat sallittuja.

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: Eraana kohtalokkaana iltana pienessa englantilaisessa paikallisteatterissa toisen maailmansodan aikana joukko kiertavia nayttelijoita esittaa Shakespearen naytelman "Kuningas Lear".

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: Uraansa aloittelevalle poliisille on vain yksi asia, joka on vaarallisempi kuin tappajan fantasian paljastaminen: tappajan fantasiaksi joutuminen.

programme.title: Keinottelua
programme.desc: Menestyvan liikemiehen Robert Millerin (Gere) taydelliselta vaikuttava elama ajautuu syoksykierteeseen yhden kohtalokkaan erehdyksen seurauksena. Miller loytaa itsensa tasapainoilemasta perhe-elaman, yrityskauppojen, uhkaavan kavallussyytteen ja syrjahypyn ristipaineessa. Saatuaan viela sinnikkaan poliisietsiva Michael Bryerin (Roth) peraansa, joutuu Miller epatoivoiseen kujanjuoksuun yrittaessaan korjata tekemansa virheet ennen kuplan puhkeamista.

programme.title: Puhdistaja (Walking Tall)
programme.desc: Kun on kyse lain noudattamisesta, yksi mies voi tehda eron! Toimintatahti Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson ei ota vankeja taistellessaan oikeuden puolesta ja murskatessaan korruptiota tassa tarinassa miehesta, joka ottaa kantaa… ja ottaa kaupunkinsa takaisin!

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head to England to bring home a new plane. Devan does target-practice in the DC-4.James builds a Buffalo-style soapbox racer.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe flies with the Snowbirds during the Hamilton air show and later teaches Mikey to fly. A surprise departure shakes up Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Ice Pilots NWT celebrates a milestone with a look back at the last five years, a peek behind the camera and reflections from the Buffalo crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: An engine fire and series of mechanical gremlins has Buffalo scrambling to make its Christmas deliveries. Newest rampie Prefkar Mony struggles with life in the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine trouble plagues Buffalos newest Electra, ZFE, and a standoff between Joe and Transport Canada threatens to close the airline. At the same time, Joe faces a tough decision about his old dog Sophie.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie pilot Jeff nearly runs off the runway. Prefkar learns to play hockey but drops the ball at Buffalo and Joe goes on a date with a real dog.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey decides to get Buffalo involved in a D-Day paratrooper jump to commemorate the 70th anniversary of D-Day.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos top guns, rookies and vets, go to California for aerial dogfights in real fighter planes. Cory and Mikey race to get ready for the D-Day jump.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalos crucial food and mail runs come to a halt.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A string of bad luck turns chief pilot Arnies 66th birthday run into the flight from hell - and threatens to spoil his naughty birthday surprise.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A furious Joe fights against a federal suspension that will prevent him from carrying passengers for the first time in 20 years.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and Candace get married in the Ice Castle. A frustrated Chuck tries to get the Electra to pay her way. A flummoxed Mikey tries to bake a cake for Joes birthday.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo - or will she go?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head off to Coventry, England to navigate the potential purchase of an Electra turboprop to add to Buffalos fleet of fire-fighting tanker planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After her husbands acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a deadly fire destroys a northern outpost a week before Christmas, Buffalo puts everything aside to come to the rescue.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The curse of -40 hits Buffalo pilots Devan and Scott on a food mail flight up the Mackenzie Valley when a mysterious rise in oil pressure threatens to destroy one of the C-46s engines.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey goes on a treasure hunt to Venezuela for a rare CL-215 waterbomber.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A vital ferry link is down, so Buffalo mounts an all-out campaign to airlift 100,000lbs of essential goods across the Mackenzie River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A multi-stop mission to the Far North has Devan, Scott and Adam facing a series of white- knuckle obstacles.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Young pilots AJ and Andrew get the chance of a lifetime to fly the magnificent DC-3 specially equipped with skis to land on frozen strips.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo scores the charter of a lifetime when theyre asked to transport the Stanley Cup on a tour of the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When thunderstorms and a shaking engine threaten a DC-3 charter to Whitehorse, Joe pulls out all the stops to get the passengers to their destination.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo gets into the stunt flying business when veteran pilot Arnie flies the DC-4 for the re- enactment scene of a famous WWII bombing raid.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage in Yellowknife, new manager Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and new senior manager Duane to work things out.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duanes decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract, and could cost him his job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Weighed down by the responsibility of training a new rampie, and struggling to get out of Joes doghouse, DC-3 co-pilot Tyler gets a once in a lifetime opportunity to stunt fly in his Cessna 150 for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A week before Christmas, Buffalo agrees to lend a hand to an RCMP initiative to fly toys to isolated communities in the north.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory attempt to place a Canadair CL-215 aircraft onto a cargo ship for delivery to a Korean company.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalos water bomber plane to new buyers there.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Rays retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Greenlands Narsarsuaq airport - known as one the worlds most dangerous approaches - looms on the horizon as Cory and Justin begin a trans-global journey to deliver two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey links up with Chris Hadfield aboard the International Space Station. Problems mount while trying to get a frozen DC-4 airborne.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe races a quirky antique snowmobile - with an airplane engine and no brakes. The water bomber crew struggles to get two planes out of Turkey. Cocky rampie Chris Staples tries to prove himself in the C-46.

programme.title: Believe
programme.desc: Franco continues to claw back points and has a nail biting wait to find out if he has won ‘Rookie of the Year’. Will he be riding again next year?

programme.title: Trapped In A Glacier
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Fight to Survive S2 - "Trapped In A Glacier"
programme.desc: While hiking alone deep in Glacier National Park, Ted Porter plummets into an icy glacial crevasse. With a broken back and miles from anyone, he must fight to survive.

programme.title: Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Fight to Survive S2 - "Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 1"
programme.desc: Hunters Adrian Knopps and Garrett Hagen venture into the remotest part of Alaska’s Misty Fjord, hunting Moose and Bear. After a successful hunt Adrian finds himself trapped by a twenty foot tidal surge after Garrett fails to return with the skiff.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Fighting Fish"
programme.desc: Angling experts Lori-Ann Murphy and Aaron Adams prove that catching a tarpon is no easy feat as they try to land a silver king in the Florida Keys. Dr. Jerry Ault discusses the research underway as scientists try to unravel the mysteries of these fish.

programme.title: Tippets and Leaders
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Tippets and Leaders"
programme.desc: The teams goal of landing and tagging a mature tarpon is fulfilled, as one of the anglers lands a 60lbs silver king. Michael Keaton and Yvon Choulnard spend time wading throught the flats together and we look back on the week spend in Belize.

programme.title: Lifted
programme.desc: As their Alaska journey nears its end, Kaid and R.L. reflect on lifes priorities and lessons learned. Lifelong bonds are cemented as they prepare for extraction.

programme.title: Salvage Gone Awry
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Salvage Gone Awry"
programme.desc: Joel and Mark Barker tempt fate and fly into no mans land to find and salvage a white airplane in a snowy forest, and fight hypothermia along the way.

programme.title: Heaven at 5,000 Feet
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Heaven at 5,000 Feet"
programme.desc: Pilot Josiah Freeman takes a professional snowboarder Mark Barajas to the top of the Chugach Mountains for some hellacious heli-skiing.

programme.title: South Minerva Reef
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 South Seas Spearo S2 - "South Minerva Reef"
programme.desc: The team embark on their biggest mission to date, an expedition to the remote and revered Minerva Reefs, where they encounter the most incredible diving conditions theyve ever experienced, but also, a thriving population of voracious sharks!

programme.title: North Minerva Reef
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 South Seas Spearo S2 - "North Minerva Reef"
programme.desc: After punching their way to North Minerva, the fellas continue their quest to land a big pelagic, but the local toothies threaten to throw a spanner into the team’s plans. Can they bag a tropical trophy, or will the sharks rain on their parade?

programme.title: Day Three Begins
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Three Begins"
programme.desc: Day three ends at Hurricane Hole Marina in Key West, Florida, on the Madfin Shark Series and there can bo only one Madfin Shark Champion.

programme.title: Fish Tales Fly Shop (Calgary Alberta)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E08 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Fish Tales Fly Shop (Calgary Alberta)"
programme.desc: Jenna McKeown visits Calgary Alberta to fish the Bow River. This is one of the few rivers in the world that runs through a major city yet has excellent fishing.

programme.title: Snowshoe Camp Resort (Algoma)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E09 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Snowshoe Camp Resort (Algoma)"
programme.desc: Mikey Metcalfe and Mark Melnyk are hunting for giant smallmouth bass, even a record, on a fly. They visit one of the best areas to do so in Ontario.

programme.title: Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Fight to Survive S2 - "Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 2"
programme.desc: After a successful hunt, Adrian Knopps’ hunting partner disappears taking their bear out to the boat. Now Adrian finds himself stranded on a tidal flat surround by bears and wolf packs and with massive storm bearing down on him. How will he survive?

programme.title: The Journal
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Fight to Survive S2 - "The Journal"
programme.desc: Pastor Mike Turner is on a solo hike across the continental divide in the unforgiving Wind Rivers Range of Wyoming, when he becomes hopelessly trapped under a boulder. He chronicles his grueling 11 day fight to survive in his own journal.

programme.title: The Italian Hare
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "The Italian Hare"
programme.desc: Travel back to the Apennine Mountains in Italy and join a hare hunt all the way up and above the clouds.

programme.title: The Tuscan Boar
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "The Tuscan Boar"
programme.desc: Discover a master knife maker, pursue wild boar in the hills, and experience the charm of an award-winning castle.

programme.title: Birds of a Feather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Birds of a Feather"
programme.desc: Mario enjoys the camaraderie and challenge of duck hunting on opening day and then teaches the audience how to cook an ancient Chinese recipe with one of the leading chefs of an award-winning restaurant from New Zealand.

programme.title: Man Eating Crocs
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Man Eating Crocs"
programme.desc: Mario risks it all by rafting down the deadliest strip of water in Africa, the Zambezi River, towards lake Kariba, only to find himself in front of some of the biggest and baddest problematic man-eating crocodiles on the planet.

programme.title: Arluk Outfitters
programme.sub-title: S17 : E02 The New Fly Fisher S17 - "Arluk Outfitters"
programme.desc: We re-visit the famed Main River in Northern Newfoundland to fly fish for wild Atlantic Salmon.

programme.title: Carolyn Beach Motel
programme.sub-title: S17 : E03 The New Fly Fisher S17 - "Carolyn Beach Motel"
programme.desc: Alyx Parks and Colin McKeown are on a DIY early season smallmouth bass trip to located big pre-spawn bass!

programme.title: Hanging by a Thread
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Hanging by a Thread"
programme.desc: Tanalian Aviation bush pilots Joel and Josiah earn their keep slinging a stranded snow machine.

programme.title: Into the Deep
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Into the Deep"
programme.desc: The bush pilots have to use all their skills - scuba diving, underwater rigging and expert flying - to try and salvage a de Havilland Beaver wing at the bottom of the 6 Mile Lake.

programme.title: Flying High
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Flying High"
programme.desc: The Tanalian bush pilots transport extreme paragliders to Moose Creek, in the Talkeetna Range, for a once-in-a-lifetime airbone experience.

programme.title: Gran Canaria - Part One
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Hunting Fish S1 - "Gran Canaria - Part One"
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to locate a rare Mirror Carp in stunning Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Gran Canaria - Part Two
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Hunting Fish S1 - "Gran Canaria - Part Two"
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to fish wild Tuna in stunning Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Norway
programme.desc: Thom Hunt challenges himself to fish for Cod in picturesque Norway in freezing conditions.

programme.title: Permanent Residence
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Trail S1 - "Permanent Residence"
programme.desc: Laramy and 7 find a long term camping spot out of the snow and at a lower elevation. Laramy gets to work making a more permanent shelter and looking for food.

programme.title: Focused on Food
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Trail S1 - "Focused on Food"
programme.desc: Laramy locates some whitetail deer and focuses his efforts on hunting them.

programme.title: Thriving
programme.desc: Stocked up on food, Laramy and 7 thrive at their new location. Laramy focuses on building some amenities to make life easier on The Trail.

programme.title: Tree Stand Fall
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Fight to Survive S2 - "Tree Stand Fall"
programme.desc: Deer hunter Nathan Holcomb plummets from his tree stand. Every hunters’ worst nightmare becomes Nathan’s reality. With a broken back paralyzing him, Nathan must crawl out on his own to find help.

programme.title: Adrift Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Fight to Survive S2 - "Adrift Pt. 1"
programme.desc: In what is regarded as one of greatest survival stories of the 20th Century, sailor Steven Callahan finds himself alone and adrift in a life raft after his boat, the Napoleon Solo, sinks in the mid Atlantic.

programme.title: Adrift Pt. 2
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Fight to Survive S2 - "Adrift Pt. 2"
programme.desc: Facing starvation, dehydration and predators from the deep, sailor Steven Callahan fights to survive not only the physical hardships, but also the mental and emotional strain of being adrift and alone in a disintegrating life raft.

programme.title: The Ghost of Transylvania
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "The Ghost of Transylvania"
programme.desc: Climbing the wild peaks in the story riddled the Carpathian Mountains, home to the most famous hunter of all, Dracula!

programme.title: The Italian Hare
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "The Italian Hare"
programme.desc: Travel back to the Apennine Mountains in Italy and join a hare hunt all the way up and above the clouds.

programme.title: The Tuscan Boar
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "The Tuscan Boar"
programme.desc: Discover a master knife maker, pursue wild boar in the hills, and experience the charm of an award-winning castle.

programme.title: Arluk Outfitters
programme.sub-title: S17 : E02 The New Fly Fisher S17 - "Arluk Outfitters"
programme.desc: We re-visit the famed Main River in Northern Newfoundland to fly fish for wild Atlantic Salmon.

programme.title: Carolyn Beach Motel
programme.sub-title: S17 : E03 The New Fly Fisher S17 - "Carolyn Beach Motel"
programme.desc: Alyx Parks and Colin McKeown are on a DIY early season smallmouth bass trip to located big pre-spawn bass!

programme.title: Yellowfin Mission
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Yellowfin Mission"
programme.desc: Words gotten out about some massive yellowfin baitballs, so the team head out in search of more tuna glory. Dwane, Kieran, Sam and Dave then bounce over the ditch for a few days diving the stunning waters of the Great Barrier Reef.

programme.title: Lucinda Sky with Diamonds
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Lucinda Sky with Diamonds"
programme.desc: The lads try their luck at getting a spear into one of the quintessential Australian fish species - the barramundi. Problem is, these barra inhabit the same waters as a couple of other less welcome locals - saltwater crocodiles and bull sharks!

programme.title: Just Another Fijian
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Just Another Fijian"
programme.desc: Dwane and Jools are joined by their pint sized proteges this week, as 12-year-olds Eli and Reef tag along on the adventure with the old men on a mission to explore the far flung waters of North Eastern Fiji.

programme.title: On Thin Ice
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "On Thin Ice"
programme.desc: On a rare day off, Josiah and his friends white water raft where few have gone before - on top of the massive Knik Glacier.

programme.title: Stay or Go
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 Dropped S8 - "Stay or Go"
programme.desc: Miles upon miles remain in the trip, but should the brothers leave animals to find animals?

programme.title: End of the Line
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 Dropped S8 - "End of the Line"
programme.desc: Alaska doesnt asks you to leave, she tells you to leave.

programme.title: Return Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Trail S1 - "Return Home"
programme.desc: Laramy and 7 say goodbye to their final camp and head home.

programme.title: Edge of the Earth
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Edge of the Earth"
programme.desc: The first episode sets the stage for Chris and Caseys journey, detailing the terrain, weather, and hunting style theyll encounter. It also delves into the projects backstory and its initiation.

programme.title: On Top of the World
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "On Top of the World"
programme.desc: Chris and Casey traverse waterways, muskeg, and mountains hunting a huge caribou bull. Chris hurts his knee, questioning his endurance.

programme.title: Nightmare Canyon - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Fight to Survive S3 - "Nightmare Canyon - Part 1"
programme.desc: Justin and Jeremy Harris’ weekend decent into a remote Utah canyon becomes a survival nightmare when Justin severely breaks his leg. As night fast approaches and temperatures drop below freezing, how will these two brothers survive?

programme.title: Nightmare Canyon - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Fight to Survive S3 - "Nightmare Canyon - Part 2"
programme.desc: After Justin Harris severely breaks his leg deep in a remote, Utah canyon, it ‘s up to his brother Jeremy to climb out for help. Clawing his way through icy pools of water and up rock faces, pushes Jeremy to his limit.

programme.title: The Ghost of Transylvania
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "The Ghost of Transylvania"
programme.desc: Climbing the wild peaks in the story riddled the Carpathian Mountains, home to the most famous hunter of all, Dracula!

programme.title: The Bavarian Wolf in Hungary
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "The Bavarian Wolf in Hungary"
programme.desc: Journey to the rolling hills of Balaton Lake in Hungary and explore the possibilities of recreating a biodiverse agricultural future with an avid hunter.

programme.title: Religious Fervour
programme.desc: Massive crowds gather at Allahabad’s Maha Kumbh Mela and Manila’s Black Nazarene, creating major healthcare challenges. Thousands of medical personnel and volunteers are deployed to keep people safe.

programme.title: Namibian Desert Onyx
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Namibian Desert Onyx"
programme.desc: Mario was told by locals that deep in the Namibian desert there is an odd-looking creature that is great nutritional value that has been harvested by people for hundreds of years.

programme.title: Kalahari Bushmen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Kalahari Bushmen"
programme.desc: In the Kalahari Desert is an ancient tribe that has lived off the land since the beginning of man kind. These people are known as the Naru bushman.

programme.title: Rising Waters
programme.desc: As Chris and Casey Keefer continue downriver, they rely more on fish, ducks, and berries as the moose rut approaches. An epic Alaskan rainstorm brings heavy repercussions for their success.

programme.title: All Eyes On Us
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Dropped S3 - "All Eyes On Us"
programme.desc: Chris and Casey Keefer fish for dinner and edge closer to extraction. However, another encounter with a grizzly jeopardizes their safety as the bear ventures too close to camp!

programme.title: POLICE OF THE WEALTHY vs POLICE OF THE POOR
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Police Patrol S1 - "POLICE OF THE WEALTHY vs POLICE OF THE POOR"
programme.desc: In Buenos Aires, a special police unit works in marginalized neighborhoods to restore public trust. In Haiti, the police face tough challenges daily to maintain order and uphold the justice system.

programme.title: BORDER POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Police Patrol S1 - "BORDER POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: Ciudad Juárez, a key Mexico–USA border city, is a major route for migrants seeking a better life. Mexican Federal Police special forces patrol the area to prevent illegal crossings and suspicious activity.

programme.title: ISLAND POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Police Patrol S1 - "ISLAND POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: To curb violence in Tananarive, Madagascar, a rapid-response police unit was formed. Meanwhile, a special team patrols Reunion Island nightly to keep security on this island paradise.

programme.title: The River Migration
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "The River Migration"
programme.desc: The duo journeys downriver hunting Yukon Bull Moose, covering nearly 20 miles in two days. They establish moose camp despite an unsettling encounter with a nearby grizzly.

programme.title: Prayer Point
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Prayer Point"
programme.desc: On day three at "Prayer Point", Casey faces another opportunity, inconveniently timed. While answering natures call, a bull respondes to cow calls from camp, appearing across the river.

programme.title: Night Stalkers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Night Stalkers"
programme.desc: Exhausted and famished, the brothers persist downstream, barely mustering energy to set camp. They find abundant signs of moose and favorable terrain for their habitat.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Anthony strives to prove himself as medical lead responding to a snowmobile crash on Togwotee Pass.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: The first priority of every mission is team safety, so when conditions on Pyramid Peak threaten Jake and Cody during a rescue, Tim demands they pump the breaks.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Jake and Marilynn cancel a dinner party so they can respond to an injured skier on Teton Pass.

programme.title: Under The Desert Sun
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Fight to Survive S3 - "Under The Desert Sun"
programme.desc: Ed Rosenthal set out for a short hike in Joshua Tree National Park, but in the heat of the day he became turned around and lost. His six-day ordeal of survival in blazing temperatures with no food or water is nothing short of miraculous.

programme.title: Tree Stand Nightmare
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Fight to Survive S3 - "Tree Stand Nightmare"
programme.desc: When avid bow hunter, Dr. Joe Baumgardner sets out to do routine maintenance on his tree stands, a twenty two foot fall leaves him with a severely broken leg and miles from help in the deep Mississippi woods.

programme.title: Crushed By A Boulder - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Fight to Survive S3 - "Crushed By A Boulder - Part 1"
programme.desc: While solo climbing Mt. Goddard, a remote peak in the California Sierra, Gregg Hein’s leg is crushed by a boulder and he’s sent careening down the mountain. Barely able to stop his fall, he’s now faced with a horrific compound fracture.

programme.title: Driven in France
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "Driven in France"
programme.desc: Rich in abundance and history, the hills around Kayserberg, Alsace, are full of wildlife. Two friends set out to build a system to share that abundance with the rest of France, from forest to fork!

programme.title: Follow the Fallow
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "Follow the Fallow"
programme.desc: After two years of anticipation, fallow deer can finally be hunted on new hunting grounds on top of the Italian Apennine mountains.

programme.title: Feathers and Fur
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "Feathers and Fur"
programme.desc: The wind is constantly blowing from the West on the island of Fanø in Denmark. Take the ferry to over, to hunt woodcock and rabbits with Jesper, his dog, and his ferret.

programme.title: Big Cities
programme.desc: Osaka, Japan, struggles with increasing emergency calls from its aging population. In fast-paced Greater Mexico City, home to 20 million people, medical services face overwhelming demand.

programme.title: National Day
programme.desc: In Israel, back-to-back Memorial and Independence Days put heavy demands on Magen David Adom. In Belgium, the July 21 national holiday draws over 200,000 people, triggering a surge in medical emergencies.

programme.title: Rising Waters
programme.desc: As Chris and Casey Keefer continue downriver, they rely more on fish, ducks, and berries as the moose rut approaches. An epic Alaskan rainstorm brings heavy repercussions for their success.

programme.title: All Eyes On Us
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Dropped S3 - "All Eyes On Us"
programme.desc: Chris and Casey Keefer fish for dinner and edge closer to extraction. However, another encounter with a grizzly jeopardizes their safety as the bear ventures too close to camp!

programme.title: Untouched Atols
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Untouched Atols"
programme.desc: Just off the coast of Africa is a strip of 115 islands called the Seychelles. Originally claimed by France in the 1700s most of the population speak French and the influence is felt in its cuisine.

programme.title: Heartbreak Tuna Capetown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Heartbreak Tuna Capetown"
programme.desc: When two oceans collide, there is mayhem on the horizon. On this episode Mario ventures off the coast of Cape Town where the Indian ocean meets the Atlantic.

programme.title: Getting Close to Black Death
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Getting Close to Black Death"
programme.desc: Deep in the wilderness of Northern South Africa, poaching is rife, and the wilderness is as dangerous as it gets. Mario attempts to be the first person in the area to have ever harvested one of the most dangerous animals known to Africa.

programme.title: Exploration Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Exploration Camp"
programme.desc: Days pass, moose elusive since Day 11. Restless nights with lurking creatures. They find an abandoned trappers cabin, home to a huge grizzly.

programme.title: Prayer Point 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Prayer Point 2"
programme.desc: On the third day of river travel, the crew desperately seeks a hunting camp to lift morale and pursue the giant bull. Frustration mounts as the brothers confess uncertainty for the first time.

programme.title: King of the Tundra
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "King of the Tundra"
programme.desc: Casey downs a huge bull near the river. Another bull approaches, leading to a tense standoff across the river.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: The team battles high winds in the heli to save a snowmobiler with a busted femur.

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: Unprecedented three rescues in under twelve hours.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Jamie puts his trust in new explosives technology.

programme.title: Crushed By A Boulder - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Fight to Survive S3 - "Crushed By A Boulder - Part 2"
programme.desc: After his leg is crushed by a boulder, Gregg Hein is stranded on a high Sierra peak with an infected compound fracture. Knowing he won’t be reported missing for days, Gregg attempts to crawl off the mountain and rescue himself.

programme.title: Jamtland, Sweden
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Epic Trails S2 - "Jamtland, Sweden"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads 63 degrees north to Jamtland, Sweden, where he discovers a wild culture and breathtaking wilderness trails.

programme.title: Wales
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads to the UK to explore the rugged Wales Coast Path—an 870-mile hiking trail that offers stunning views and adventure along one of the most dramatic coastlines in the world.

programme.title: The Gift of Loyalty
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Loyalty"
programme.desc: Leon and Kindness One® earn their sea legs one last time traveling, via cargo ship, from Asia to Vancouver, where they are greeted by a majestic wilderness and a bitter cold front.

programme.title: The Gift of Gratitude
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Gratitude"
programme.desc: On the last leg of their 25K mile global adventure, Leon and Kindness One® travel down the Pacific Coast on their way to Hollywood. Reflections of his favorite moments inspire Leon to meet up again with the first person to show him kindness.

programme.title: Back to where it all started
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Roads End S1 - "Back to where it all started"
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave are reaching the end of their incredible journey and must go back to where it all started Buenos Aires.

programme.title: Naples
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Access All Areas S1 - "Naples"
programme.desc: Francesca Chiorando is on a quest to discover the truth behind the city of Naples, is it a kingdom of violence and a culture obsessed with death?

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 A Simple Path S3 - "Philadelphia"
programme.desc: Yann immerses himself in Philadelphias skateboarding culture. He explores Nocturnal Skate Shop eats a Philly cheesesteak, visits Cloud 9 pottery studio, admires Adams art collection, skates with Celina, and experiences the creativity of FDR.

programme.title: St. Petersburg
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 A Simple Path S3 - "St. Petersburg"
programme.desc: Yann explores St. Petersburgs skateboarding community, visiting Anchor Skate shop and meeting Jay Turner, Kris Markovitch, Jake White, Naomi Glueck, Evan Starkey, and Alex Charos. He highlights creativity, self-expression, and the vibrant community.

programme.title: End of the Season
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "End of the Season"
programme.desc: The best of the big wave surfing community wrap up an amazing El Nino season with the XXL Big Wave Awards in Anaheim, California.

programme.title: St. John
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Traveling with Denella S3 - "St. John"
programme.desc: Denella "Reconnects With Paradise" in the smallest of the U.S. Virgin Islands - St. John. St. John has some of the worlds most beautiful beaches.

programme.title: St. Martin
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Traveling with Denella S3 - "St. Martin"
programme.desc: St. Martin, "The Friendly Island" of the French Caribbean, with its blend of warm hospitality and European style.

programme.title: Rose Garden
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Rose Garden"
programme.desc: Mike’s couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto and Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, and want to start a family of their own.

programme.title: Smart Investment
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Smart Investment"
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez’s couple is looking for and these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations.

programme.title: Lisbon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Lisbon"
programme.desc: Two street artists are fusing their styles together in one of the worlds finest cities, Lisbon.The challenge is left hanging by a thread when disaster strikes.

programme.title: North Carolina
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Van Life S1 - "North Carolina"
programme.desc: Meet Lisa, a former lawyer who escaped the rat race and moved into a campervan after the early death of her mother. Lisa embarks on a cross-country road trip, peeking inside homes on wheels, and connecting with the incredible community of nomads.

programme.title: Mississippi, Alabama and Arkansas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 My Van Life S1 - "Mississippi, Alabama and Arkansas"
programme.desc: A hurricane in the south forces Lisa to change direction. We meet southern Van Lifers living under the radar in a state where the lifestyle is judged harshly. Tragically, Lisa’s story takes a heavy turn when she discovers that her father has died.

programme.title: Jamaica
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Running the World S1 - "Jamaica"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave are challenged to create a unique run in an unusal setting on the Island of Jamaica.

programme.title: Best of ep. 7 to 11
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Running the World S1 - "Best of ep. 7 to 11"
programme.desc: In this episode the boys look back over their time spent in Portugal India Mexico Gran Canaria and Jamaica.

programme.title: Kingdom of Mustang, Nepal
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Kingdom of Mustang, Nepal"
programme.desc: Securing special visas, the brothers get 10 ponies and 6 porters and undertake a stunning, but difficult 13-day pony trek over the Himalayas to the valley of Mustang where they will try to have a sitting with the king.

programme.title: Iceberg Alley, Newfoundland, Canada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Iceberg Alley, Newfoundland, Canada"
programme.desc: Flying a bush plane to the far-reaching tip of the ‘Rock’, the brothers are back in the rugged, isolated island where they were born. Via kayak, the brothers paddle from fishing port to fishing port before reaching their ultimate destination.

programme.title: Winelands of the Cape
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Winelands of the Cape"
programme.desc: While Xander and his team enjoy good food and wine at the family owned Spier Wine Farm, Adam spends his day making cider and looking through his family’s belongings.

programme.title: From Grabouw to Botriver
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "From Grabouw to Botriver"
programme.desc: A wine farm surrounded by mountains, a day of hiking and picnics, and delectable food paired with premium wine is on the itinerary for Xander and his team as they make their way from Grabouw to Botrivier.

programme.title: The Southern Tip of Africa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Southern Tip of Africa"
programme.desc: At the southernmost point in Africa, Xander meets up with an old friend to explore the unique landscape of a seaside town and enjoy the many amenities offered.

programme.title: Day 4
programme.desc: Jalou and Kevin travel to far colder places to challenge each other in an ice climbing competition.

programme.title: Day 5
programme.desc: In the Chinese desert, Kevin finds out that desert racing is difficult. While in Bolivia, Jalou wants to prove to her brother that women can be better drivers.

programme.title: Day 6
programme.desc: After exploring Peru, Jalou has to get over her fear when she goes white water kayaking. In Thailand, Kevin is feeling the pressure.

programme.title: North Carolina
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Van Life S1 - "North Carolina"
programme.desc: Meet Lisa, a former lawyer who escaped the rat race and moved into a campervan after the early death of her mother. Lisa embarks on a cross-country road trip, peeking inside homes on wheels, and connecting with the incredible community of nomads.
