programme.title: Texas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 My Van Life S1 - "Texas"
programme.desc: A colourful graffiti artist in Austin shares her story of loss with Lisa and gives her a tarot reading. We travel to rural Texas to overnight with Jupiter: an outspoken, non-binary person of colour, living in their vintage RV while studying law.

programme.title: The Masters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Rhys Darby in Japan S1 - "The Masters"
programme.desc: Rhys learns what makes Japanese audiences tick from a pair of comedy masters, and he puts on a comedy show of his own. Also, New Zealands mascot Pabu-chan is finally revealed to the world.

programme.title: Hong Kong
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Road Less Traveled S4 - "Hong Kong"
programme.desc: Jonathan Legg is in Asia’s world city, Hong Kong! With all things opulent and luxurious; high end art collectors to the priciest wines in the world, super car aficionados and helicopter getaways from skyscraper rooftops; this is the road less traveled from a different point of view.

programme.title: Ridermania
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Roads Unknown India S1 - "Ridermania"
programme.desc: After a crash leaves Zombie injured, the crew scrambles to stay on schedule for Ridermania. Jess arrives at the festival, participates in events and is met with overwhelming support from fans and fellow riders. The three-day celebration ends with a visit to a famous Goa beach before the crew heads to Ganpatipule.

programme.title: Bikes and Boats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Roads Unknown India S1 - "Bikes and Boats"
programme.desc: Jess and her ride crew navigate the stunning but rugged Konkan Coast, switching between bikes and boats while juggling luggage, riders and a lost phone. Gearshifter unexpectedly joins the team as they race toward Mumbai, determined to get Pulak to the city in time to visit his family.

programme.title: Nevada City
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 A Simple Path S3 - "Nevada City"

programme.title: Oakland
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 A Simple Path S3 - "Oakland"
programme.desc: Yann celebrates Oaklands skateboarding cultures diversity. He visits Unity Skate Shop and Lower Grand Radio. He explores Town Park with K-Dub, meets Jai and the Skate Like a Girl crew. Then skates Marbies mini ramp, the hook and a dragon.

programme.desc: In this episode, Piri is in Herekino where he meets local characters, brothers, Chad and Theo who take him on an epic pig hunting adventure.

programme.title: DIVING FOR KINA AT RANGIPUTA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Piri’s Tiki Tour S1 - "DIVING FOR KINA AT RANGIPUTA"
programme.desc: In this episode, Piri Weeps heads North to Rangiputa. Guided by locals Wikatana and Sandy, the trio hit the water for a kina dive. Plus Piri gains some insight on a rahui established in Ahipara.

programme.title: The Feast on the East
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Maximum Foodie S2 - "The Feast on the East"
programme.desc: The India foodie excursion continues. This time, Sashi is in the eastern fringe of India. Revelling in the colonial splendor of Kolkata, exploring bustling fish markets and a unique story of India’s only Chinatown. Sashi then tracks down south to Orissa where he comes across a once in a lifetime opportunity and access to Puri’s Jagannath temple’s maha bhog; the massive effort of religious food offerings made daily to Lord Jagannath, one of the world’s largest kitchen operations that feed over 100,000 people every single day! Following recipes and ingredients that have been unchanged for millenia - a stark contrast to the previous episode showcasing Masque and their cutting edge...

programme.title: Bali - The Hidden Side part 1
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Maximum Foodie S2 - "Bali - The Hidden Side part 1"
programme.desc: Indonesia is home to thousands of islands and exotic ingredients. But the most famous one is without a doubt, Bali. Known as a respite for travelers seeking health retreats, luxury villas, and lush tropical getaway experiences, Bali is without a doubt one of the most frequented island destinations. But there is a hidden side to it that is seeded in culture, mystery and traces of the grand splendor of Bali’s ancient kingdom legacy. To help him explore this, Sashi meets up with Reynaldo De Luna, the executive chef at the legendary Amandari. With Rey’s guidance, Sashi gets a first hand look at ancient temple ceremonies, foraging in the true wilds of Bali seeking out cashew, cloves, vanilla,...

programme.title: Aurelie Gonin
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Capturing Winter S1 - "Aurelie Gonin"
programme.desc: Aurelie Gonin is one of the few women working in winter action sports filmmaking. Over the years she gathered expertise in every aspect of her field. We join as she directs an elite ski and snowboarding qualification event of the Freeride World Tour.

programme.title: Philippines
programme.desc: This Luxe Travels episode explores one of Philippines 7000+ islands, and this particular island is voted by most travel publications to be the most beautiful in the world. We are of course talking about the island of Palawan.

programme.title: California
programme.desc: A unique episode in it’s own right, this episode features a road trip through California, Luxe Travels style; however, the focus this time around is not necessarily on luxury, it’s more about adventures and explorations on the road. Host Sophie Ashley tours around the Golden State, making stops in iconic destinations like San Francisco, Los Angeles, Monterey, and Santa Barbara. Her ride for the episode, true to the Island Hunter style is the iconic Aston Martin DB11 Volante

programme.title: Cape Verde
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Cape Verde"
programme.desc: An expat fisherman scores a big catch in Cape Verde, while another struggles in Spain. A French BandB receives its first review, and a boutique hotel launches a wedding business.

programme.title: Boutique Wedding
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Boutique Wedding"
programme.desc: Steve and his mother-in-law serve food at their Spanish bar. Ray and Yvonne host a wedding at their hotel. Two ex-actors try to bring drama to Bordeaux amid a new baby’s arrival.

programme.title: JERSEY and ITALY
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Travel in Style S2 - "JERSEY and ITALY"
programme.desc: Nestled some 12 miles off Normandy France lays the beautiful channel Island of Jersey. Part two we fly across to Portofino in Italy.

programme.title: SCOTLAND and SWITZERLAND
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Travel in Style S2 - "SCOTLAND and SWITZERLAND"
programme.desc: It’s a royal theme in part one as we stay in the royal mile of Edinburgh in Scotland in the famous Balmoral Hotel now owned by Rocco Forte. In Switzerland we discover the lake based city of Geneva with its famous landmark the Jet d’Eau.

programme.title: FRANCE
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Travel in Style S2 - "FRANCE"
programme.desc: In Paris we visit Hotel le Meurice and Hotel Plaza Athenee, then head down south to sunny Cannes and stay in the Carlton made famous of course by Elton John.

programme.title: Old and New Delhi…A City of Contrasts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Journeys in India S1 - "Old and New Delhi…A City of Contrasts"
programme.desc: We explore the capital of India. The bustling metropolis is filled with modern skyscrapers that stand side-by-side with hundreds of ancient monuments, making Delhi a physical dichotomy of yesterday and tomorrow.

programme.title: Great Caves of Ajanta and Ellora
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Journeys in India S2 - "Great Caves of Ajanta and Ellora"
programme.desc: The Hindu, Buddhist and Jain caves in these two UNESCO sites contain some of the most beautiful carvings and paintings found in Asia. This episode explores the history and relationship between these religions.

programme.title: Jodhpur: India’s Queen of the Desert
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Journeys in India S2 - "Jodhpur: India’s Queen of the Desert"
programme.desc: No city in the Great Thar Desert of West India has had the sway that Jodhpur has. Giant forts, impressive palaces and a legendary royal hero that frees his people from tyrannical outsiders all make this a fascinating historic romp.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Bucket List"
programme.desc: Mike’s friend invites him to an Indian wedding and tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. This client is looking for an investment property and a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Right Choice
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Right Choice"
programme.desc: Daryl and Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found and Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl’s client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land and nature.

programme.title: Big City Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Big City Home"
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil and has always wanted to skydive with her clients.

programme.title: Dream Homes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 House Hunt S1 - "Dream Homes"
programme.desc: Lovebirds Jess and Simon need help from their parents to buy a home on Auckland’s North Shore and Queenstown couple Will and Grace prepare to go to auction on their dream home.

programme.title: Newlyweds
programme.desc: Newly wed immigrants Sam and Maria get some inside info from a real estate agent as they search for a home for their future family.. and in Auckland, North Shore duo Jess and Simon prepare to go to auction on their dream home, but will their budget of $615,000 be enough?

programme.title: Family Affair
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 House Hunt S1 - "Family Affair"
programme.desc: Siblings Courtney and Tom join forces with their partners and younger sister Natalie to buy their first home in Auckland, but can they find a place big enough to make their dreams of communal living a reality? And in Wellington will visa delays put an end to Sam and Maria’s dreams of home ownership?

programme.title: Philippines/ Maldives Special
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Luxe Travels S1 - "Philippines/ Maldives Special"
programme.desc: Elise Ducan showcases Philippines best resorts in El Nido Palawan; to continue on the theme of luxury travel, she heads to Maldives to explore 2 of the finest properties there; Shangri La and COMO Maalifushi

programme.title: Ice Hotel, Sweden - Bangkok
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Ice Hotel, Sweden - Bangkok"
programme.desc: From the hustle and bustle of Bangkok to the freezing temperatures of the Ice Hotel in Sweden, this episode is all about polar opposites, fire and ice.

programme.title: St Tropez - St Lucia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "St Tropez - St Lucia"
programme.desc: Romantic Caribbean Islands and sleeping fishing villages turned European jet set resorts, this episode travels from St Lucia to St Tropez.

programme.title: Ulagala, Sri Lanka - Florence
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Ulagala, Sri Lanka - Florence"
programme.desc: From Michael Angelo’s David in Florence to elephant safaris in Sri Lanka, this is an art lovers and outdoorsy adventure.

programme.title: ITALY and FRANCE
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Travel in Style S2 - "ITALY and FRANCE"
programme.desc: This time we visit Milan the home of fashion. In part two we are all at sea, well more on river to be truthful in beautiful Burgandy in the wine region of France.

programme.title: CAPE TOWN and BLUE MOUNTAINS
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Travel in Style S2 - "CAPE TOWN and BLUE MOUNTAINS"
programme.desc: In the episode we visit the Mother City of South Africa – Cape Town. The second half of the show is based in the distinctive blue haze of the Blue Mountains, Australia.

programme.title: BANGKOK and NEW YORK
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Travel in Style S2 - "BANGKOK and NEW YORK"
programme.desc: We visit floating Markets, Royal Palaces and the new spa and sauna of the Peninsula Hotel in Bangkok. Then it’s off to the city thats so good they named it twice… New York!

programme.title: Coastal Paradise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Australias Amazing Homes S1 - "Coastal Paradise"
programme.desc: Australia is universally known for its sun and its stunning beaches. Johanna and Pete visit some very special coastal retreats that not only have gorgeous architecture but set benchmarks for environmental design.

programme.title: City Dreams
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "City Dreams"
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez’s client is selling their separate properties and looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc.

programme.title: Cottage Getaways
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Cottage Getaways"
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike’s client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land and privacy.

programme.title: Desert Holiday
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Desert Holiday"
programme.desc: A London family relocates to run a gite in rural France. Two friends compete to open a Spanish seafront bar and Expats test a holiday complex in the Spanish desert.

programme.title: Budget for a Dream
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 House Hunt S1 - "Budget for a Dream"
programme.desc: In Auckland, Siblings Courtney and Tom joined forces with their partners and younger sister Natalie to buy their first home in Auckland..but will Natalie’s change of heart put an end to their dreams of communal living? And in Hastings can childhood sweethearts Joe and Maria find a home for $240,000?

programme.title: Challenges
programme.desc: Still reeling from the blow to their budget, can Hastings couple Joe and Maria regroup and find a home? And in Wellington Americans Bonnie and Matt want a warm, dry home for their family and they’ve come up with a bold plan…

programme.title: Race for the Place
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 House Hunt S1 - "Race for the Place"
programme.desc: Will Bonnie and Matt’s dreams of prefab living come true or will it all come crashing down? And in Hamilton, animal lovers Monique and Chris need to find their first home in a hurry…

programme.title: Lisbon V Parrot Cay (Turks and Caicos)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Jet Set S1 - "Lisbon V Parrot Cay (Turks and Caicos)"
programme.desc: In the penultimate episode Richard remains in the Turks and Caicos Islands, only this time he’s visiting the exclusive island resort of Parrot Cay. While Gill’s combining a city and beach break in the Portuguese capital of Lisbon.

programme.title: Coastal Paradise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Australias Amazing Homes S1 - "Coastal Paradise"
programme.desc: Australia is universally known for its sun and its stunning beaches. Johanna and Pete visit some very special coastal retreats that not only have gorgeous architecture but set benchmarks for environmental design.

programme.title: Algarve and Parrot Cay (Turks and Caicos Islands)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Algarve and Parrot Cay (Turks and Caicos Islands)"
programme.desc: From miles of soft golden sand in Portugal’s Algarve region, to the miles of sand that surrounds Parrot Cay Island in the Turks and Caicos, this is a beach lover’s episode.

programme.title: Copenhagen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Running the World S1 - "Copenhagen"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to Copenhagen to meet up with a local free runner and undertake an epic run of Tivoli Gardens.

programme.title: Desert Holiday
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Desert Holiday"
programme.desc: A London family relocates to run a gite in rural France. Two friends compete to open a Spanish seafront bar and Expats test a holiday complex in the Spanish desert.

programme.title: Big Wave World Tour
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Big Wave World Tour"
programme.desc: Trevor Carlson puts everything on the line to chase monster waves from Maui, Hawaii to Ensenada, Mexico.

programme.desc: Alan tuo Jade Cityyn ostajaryhman, mika saa Claudian tiimin paniikkiin ja etsimaan kauden ensimmaiset myytavat jadelohkareet.

programme.desc: Kun miehisto rampii mudassa etsiessaan miljoonan dollarin arvoista lohkaretta, Josh riskeeraa puolen miljoonan dollarin arvoisen kaluston yrittaessaan vetaa rekkaansa pois vajoamasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada ihmisia ja varusteita syrjaiseen leiriinsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia ja Robin yrittavat tehda vaikutuksen uusiin liikekumppaneihinsa, mutta ensimmaiset paivat uudella alueellaan Bullion Creekissa ovat turhauttavia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivoksesta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivokselta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin tekee vaikean paatoksen rakkaan kaivosautonsa Six packin suhteen toisen kalliiksi tulleen rikkoutumisen jalkeen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Talven lahestyessa Claudia ajaa uupuneen miehistonsa murtumispisteeseen, mika saa kiihkon leimahtamaan ja pakottaa Claudian viimein hyvaksymaan tappionsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Uusi kaivoskausi on taynna ikavia yllatyksia, mutta epatodennakoinen tapahtuma pelastaa tilanteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh on kyllastynyt tyoskentelemaan isalleen, joten han perustaa oman kuorma-autoyrityksensa uudella rekalla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Armeijan kuorma-auto hajoaa julmalla tiella kaivokselle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Gary ja poikansa pelastavat vanhan armeijan kuorma-auton, mutta sen ajaminen kaivokselle on raakaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Garon ja Josh menettavat Six packin hallinnan mutaisilla teilla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Justin lentaa paikalle uuden vaijerisahan kanssa, mutta menettaa malttinsa yrittaessaan asentaa sita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto kohtaa loputtomasti ongelmia yrittaessaan leikata palan 18 metrin pituisesta linssista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia tuo paikalle ison porauskaluston, ja hanella on vain nelja paivaa aikaa loytaa paras jadepaikka, mutta han ja Robin eivat osaa paattaa, mista etsia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehet ottavat yhteen, kun he loppukauden kiireet pakottavat heidat tyoskentelemaan kahdessa kaivoksessa yhta aikaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto irrottaa jadelohkareita J-linssista, mutta iso ongelma tiella uhkaa kaikkea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Claudia ja Robini etsivat jadea poraamalla tuloksetta, edes yhtion geologit eivat paase yksimielisyyteen suunnitelmasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada raskaan kaluston vuorelle ennen kuin tulvivat joet katkaisevat paasyn kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Ilmassa on jannitetta, kun miehisto yrittaa saada raskasta kalustoa mutaiselle, lohkareiden peittamalle 120 kilometrin pituiselle polulle perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksen vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan on vakuuttunut siita, etta Dynastyn alueella veden tayttaman kuopan alla on jadea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin yrittaa uhmata fysiikan lakeja saadakseen massiivisen uuden kasarmin Wolverinen alueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn porukkaa koettelee huono onni, ja jokainen keksii ainutlaatuisia ratkaisuja huonon onnen karkottamiseksi.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaikki innostuvat, kun he vihdoin alkavat kaivaa esiin lupaavia vihreita lohkareita, joiden miehisto uskoo olevan miljoonien arvoisia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun ulkomaiset sijoittajat piipahtavat yllattaen tarkistamaan Wolverinen kaivosalueen toita, ja Alan yrittaa rauhoittaa tilannetta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitys kasvaa, kun kaivoskauden loppu lahestyy, ja Jade Cityn miehisto haluaa loytaa kallisarvoisen lohkareen.

programme.desc: An inmates flirting calms a jailhouse fight. An inebriated man tries to avoid his eighth DUI by claiming his car was stolen, and a disagreement over Faecbook puts a couple in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Angry over her arrest, a woman becomes combative with officers. Busted once again for drugs, a smart young woman knows she is making dumb choices but can’t stop using. A man eluding the police swipes food from his workplace before landing in jail. Officers get a laugh from an arrested panhandler who wants to buy a permit for panhandling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV a woman becomes violent with officers after having over indulged in boxed wine. In Salt Lake City, UT a drunk man is brought in for urinating in front of a family restaurant and in attempt to expedite his release he requests that the officers "git er done". In Reno, NV a former marine is taken in to custody for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers fear a man may attempt to hang himself and decide to intervene. A heavily injured man ends up in jail after taking cocaine and acid. Irascibility shadows a man with low blood sugar.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A transient man tries to resist the officers in booking then serenades them with a song. A difficult inmate blames his behavior on various medical conditions, and a woman claims to be Jesus Christ.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Toting his guitar, an inmate serenades the officers. One man protests his arrest and states that having cocaine is not a crime. A man claims to be an Iraqi War Veteran and challenges his detainment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: The night of the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight a woman pummels a nightclub security guard for an unusual reason. A man who claims to have served in the military confronts a Lieutenant and threatens fellow detainees in the holding cell. A “Pac-man” fan has a spat with his Mayweather-backing wife.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man claims to be connected to the occupy Wall Street movement. Officers struggle with a combative man, and a tearful candy thief is taken into custody.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An eccentric jail regular is welcomed back. Man fleeing Mexico details the horrors he escaped. Young woman describes her lucrative fling as a stripper. A woman finds that trying to drink away a bad boyfriend and then asking the boyfriend for bail money is not a good idea. A man collapses during booking after being arrested for drunk driving. Officers have heart to heart with a depressed inmate going through a breakup with a cheating girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Prositutes discuss their risqu̩ occupation and explain their fees. An intoxicated woman doesnt want her blood drawn, and two shoplifters face the potential consequences of their actions.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Code Blue alarms sound as inmates start fighting inside the men’s jail. An irate man with a huge beard refuses to remove bands inside his facial hair. A man with deep stab wounds stumbles into jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers transfer an over caffeinated suspect to isolation so he can unwind. A man arrested for DUI while doing donuts in a mall parking lot asserts he was robbed. A jaywalking Utah man claims someone hit him on the head. A disgruntled detainee lands a sucker punch on a fellow inmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After totaling his Corvette, a man is arrested for drunk driving. Complex personality issues are unveiled while an inmate is interrogated. A man is placed in a mask after spraying saliva far and wide.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A singer in custody performs for the officers. A woman is charged with burglary, and officers see right through a young womans tears.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in womens lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A homeless man punches a singing transient over a racist comment. An assailant hits a sleeping man with a brick over a money dispute. A sobbing young man insists he was falsely arrested. A bar fight sends a UFC fighter to the hospital and the bartender who slugged him to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In his holding cell, a man fights officers after taking Xanax. An officer discovers a suspect may be facing criminal charges for his son. K-9 units are needed during a search for improvised weapons.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate fails to impress the staff with his witticisms. A woman boasts about excelling at her DUI field test, and a man learns his wreckless driving has resulted in the death of a man.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a belligerent woman is restrained. In Portland, OR a repeat offender is placed in isolation for unruly behavior. In Las Vegas, NV a man opens up about how his friends and family feel about him in a holding cell. In Spokane, WA a man is jailed in an attempt to steal coffee for his friends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought in for attacking her boyfriend. A talkative inmate is moved to isolation, and an daring inmate attempts to escape his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested during a dangerous drug deal struggles to face jail time. Tempers flare when a man makes threats against the arresting officers. Marijuana falls out of a man’s pockets during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an honest offender turns himself in. Officers arrest an underage woman who admits to driving under the influence. A woman is taken into custody after harming herself with a pair of scissors

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a man is sent to a holding cell after hurling racial insults. In Reno, NV A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody for battery of a police officer. In Portland, OR an intoxicated eldery man breaks into song during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a combative inmate provokes the use of pepper spray. In Sarasota, FL a drunk woman is uncooperative during processing. In Spokane, WA a man attempts to flip off the camera while taking his mug-shot.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Im Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Acts of aggression cause a man to be placed in a restraint chair. Jail lockdown occurs after an inmate is stabbed with a pencil. After being booked for road rage a woman unleashes a venomous tirade.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman comes clean to having drugs hidden where they can’t be seen. An inmate’s exotic makeup is cleverly created with candy and toothpaste. A couple is surprised to find that holding someone against their will is a felony. Doing the right thing turns into an extended stay for a woman with warrants.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After cutting her head, a woman bites and kicks deputies. To investigate potential hidden meanings, a man’s tattoos are examined. A confused man is found with illegal mushrooms at a bus stop.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate becomes aggressive during a routine pat down. A confused senior citizen thinks the detention center is the site of a poetry slam, and two girlfriends come to blows while gambling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An aspiring martial-arts fighter tries to wriggle out of handcuffs and gets stuck. A football rivalry takes a bad turn when a Steelers fan assaults a Ravens fan.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man fresh out of prison tries to prove how tough he is. A drunk woman rages against everyone in her path. A couple’s wedding plans are ruined after officers find their stash of meth, and an arrest leaves an elderly gentleman singing the blues after being processed for a possession charge.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate is subdued for refusing to follow commands. A woman accused of running out on a dinner bill has her jewelry sawed off in jail. After issuing criminal terrorist threats, a man is jailed.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A dominatrix is arrested for playing rough. A father is accused of assaulting his daughters boyfriend, and an inmates negative attitude leads to trouble.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated inmate escapes his restraints. A young woman denies she abused her mother, and a guard removes an inmate who is causing a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A testy man is sent to the isolation cell to "cool off." A teary-eyed young man maintains his innocence. An inmate may have ingested contraband to avoid possession charges.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A hysterical woman is transferred to an isolation cell. A woman shows her undying LA pride to the arresting officers. A young woman is put under observation for threatening harm to herself.

programme.title: A Haunted House 2
programme.desc: Tassa hulvattomassa jatko-osassa Marlon Wayans palaa Malcolmina, joka saatuaan entisen demoninsa karkotettua aloittaa uuden elaman uuden tyttoystavansa ja taman kahden lapsen kanssa. Muutettuaan unelmakotiinsa Malcolmia vaivaavat jalleen oudot paranormaalit tapahtumat, eika talla kertaa vain talo ole kummitusten asuttama! Jamie Pressly, Cedric the Entertainer ja Essence Atkins ovat myos mukana.

programme.title: The Beach Bum
programme.desc: The Beach Bum seuraa loppuun palaneen Moondogin (Matthew McConaughey) hillittomia epaonnenkolauksia hanen toimiessaan vain omien pelisaantojensa mukaan. Huikea tahtikaarti -Snoop Dogg, Isla Fisher, Zac Efron, Jimmy Buffett, Martin Lawrence ja Jonah Hill - takaa villin menon kumouksellissa uutuuskomediassa, jonka tarjoilee kasikirjoittaja-ohjaaja Harmony Korine.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Happy-Go-Lucky
programme.desc: Opettaja Poppy selviytyy optimisminsa turvin elaman pienista vastoinkaymisista ja levittaa ymparilleen iloa ja naurua.

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: Brittany Murphy ja Dakota Fanning loistavat kirkkaammin kuin kaikki Manhattanin valot tassa ihastuttavassa New Yorkin satukertomuksessa. Molly (Murphy) on juhlivainen prinsessa, jonka rahat juuri loppuivat. Ray (Fanning) on nirso yhdeksanvuotias tytto, jonka viimeisin lastenhoitaja juuri lahti. Kun Rayn liian kiireinen aiti (Heather Locklear) palkkaa Mollyn uudeksi lastenhoitajaksi, se on taydellinen tilaisuus molemmille tytoille muuttaa tapojaan ja oppia, etta joskus paras ystavasi voi tulla odottamattomassa muodossa!

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: Fanboys
programme.desc: Joukko Star Wars -faneja matkustaa Skywalker Ranchille varastaakseen kopion elokuvasta "The Phantom Menace," jotta heidan kuolemansairas ystavansa ehtisi nahda sen ennen sen ensi-iltaa, joka on vasta usean kuukauden paasta.

programme.title: Barbershop: The Next Cut
programme.desc: Viimeisesta tapaamisestamme Calvinin parturiliikkeessa on kulunut yli 10 vuotta. Calvin ja hanen pitkaaikainen tiiminsa ovat yha siella, mutta liike on kokenut suuria muutoksia. Huomattavin muutos on, etta aiemmin miesvaltainen turvapaikkamme on nyt sekakayttoinen.

programme.title: Dirty 30
programme.desc: Kate antaa 30-vuotispaivan aattonaan Evielle ja Charlielle luvan jarjestaa itselleen pirskeet. Juhlista sukeutuu kuitenkin menneisyytta ja nykyisyytta sekoitteleva villi peli, ja tilanne riistaytyy kaikkien kasista.

programme.title: Results
programme.desc: PT-valmentajat (Cobie Smulders ja Guy Pearce) saavat tehtavakseen saada uusrikas ja hyvin motivoitumaton asiakas (Kevin Corrigan) kuntoon. Pian tassa fiksussa ja hauskassa rakkautta ja ruumiinkuntoa kasittelevassa komediassa naiden kolmen elama ammatti- ja yksityiselama sotkeutuu umpisolmuun.

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Peace, Love and Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Komedia menestyksekkaasta newyorkilaisesta asianajajasta (Catherine Keener), joka tuo mukanaan kaksi vilkasta teini-ikaista lastaan hippiaitinsa (Jane Fonda) luo maalle perhelomalle. Rentouttava viikonloppu muuttuu kuitenkin pian seikkailun, romantiikan, musiikin, perhesalaisuuk sien ja itsensa loytamisen kesaksi.

programme.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Toimittaja tutkii murhasarjaa, joka tunnetaan nimella Spring break massacre ja se vie sekasorron viela pidemmalle tassa slasher-elokuvien parodiassa.

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: Kun lahetti toimittaa vahingossa katkettyja kokaiinitiilia sisaltavan paketin vaaraan osoitteeseen, han kaynnistaa tapahtumasarjan, jossa kokaiinia etsivat ja siita taistelevat epatoivoisesti sen lahettanyt raivostunut diileri, peloissaan olevat vastaanottajat, joille lahetys oli menossa ja paketin vahingossa vastaanottaneet henkilot, jotka aikovat varastaa sen.

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: Raavittoman hauska ja torkean naurattava kauhukomedia Paranormal Activityn tyyliin. Rakastunut nuoripari Malcom ja Keisha muuttavat unelmiensa taloon aloittaakseen yhteisen elamansa. Pian talossa alkaa tapahtua mystisia asioita ja selviaa, etteivat he olekaan kahden vaan Keishan on riivannut havyton demoni. Ahdistunut Malcom palkkaa manaajan ja lopulta nykypaivan Ghostbustersitkin ajamaan pois pahan hengen, joka terrorisoi hanen parisuhdettaan… ja ennen kaikkea seksielamaansa.

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: 36 Husbands
programme.desc: 36 Husbands on mystinen, musikaalinen Kung Fu -vakoojakomedia, jonka paaosissa on 3 vahvaa naista - ja joukko aviomiehia. Kristalla, huippuvakoojalla ja Kung Fu -mestarilla, on poikkeuksellisia voimia, ja han ottaa ne kayttoon pyrkiessaan hidastamaan tasaista kulkua kohti kolmatta maailmansotaa.

programme.title: Herakles New Yorkissa
programme.desc: Olympos-vuorelta karkotettu Herakles (Arnold Schwarzenegger) lahetetaan Maahan, missa han loytaa todellisen rakkauden ja aloittaa lupaavan uran kehonrakennusbisneksessa.

programme.title: The Stag
programme.desc: Moderni sulhanen suostuu vastentahtoisesti polttariviikonloppuun kaupunkilaisystaviensa kanssa. He lahtevat leireilemaan Lansi-Irlannin villiin luontoon. Porukan kauhuksi matkaan lyottaytyy morsiamen arvaamaton veli, johtajahahmo nimelta ”Kone”. Koneen rajahtava luonne ja hurjat johtamistavat vievat ryhman matkalle, jota he eivat unohda ikina.

programme.title: Kuukauden tyontekija (Employee of the Month)
programme.desc: Kaksi aarimmaisen kilpailunhaluista tukkukaupan tyontekijaa kilpailee ”Kuukauden tyontekija” -tittelista ja siita, kumpi voittaa kuuman uuden kassanhoitajan sydamen tassa hulvattomassa komediassa.

programme.title: Sinun, minun ja meidan (Yours, Mine and Ours)
programme.desc: Dennis Quaid ja Rene Russo tahdittavat tata ihastuttavaa uudelleenfilmatisointia vuoden 1968 samannimisesta elokuvasta. Leskeksi jaanyt rannikkovartioston amiraali ja leskeksi jaanyt kasilaukkujen suunnittelija rakastuvat ja menevat naimisiin, mika aiheuttaa suurta harmia hanen 10 ja hanen 8 lapselleen. Lasten juonitellessa vanhempiensa erottamiseksi he tajuavat, etta tarkeinta on perhe.

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: Death At A Funeral
programme.desc: Danielin ja Robertin isan kuolema saattaa toraisan perheen yhteen suremaan vainajaa. Kun hautajaisiin ilmestyva mies uhkaa paljastaa vainajan jarkyttavan salaisuuden ellei saa rahaa, on veljesten keksittava jotain paastakseen kiristajasta eroon. Seremoniasta sukeutuu taysi kaaos, kun he yrittavat estaa uutisen kantautumisen saattovaen korviin.

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: Growing Up and Other Lies
programme.desc: Vuosia taiteilijana New Yorkissa riutunut Jake aikoo palata kotiin Ohioon. Viimeisena paivanaan kaupungissa han kutsuu kolme vanhinta ystavaansa mukaan nostalgiselle kavelyretkelle Manhattanin paasta paahan. Yritys palata huolettomaan nuoruuteen ei suju ihan toiveiden mukaisesti. Vanhat ongelmat nousevat pintaan paivan mittaan, kun Jake sotkeutuu ex-tyttoystavaansa ja kaverit kamppailevat omien miehisyyskriisiensa kanssa.

programme.title: The People We Hate at the Wedding
programme.desc: Tassa hulvattoman rohkeassa komediassa disfunktioiset amerikkalaiset sisarukset Alice ja Paul – yhdessa aina optimistisen aitinsa kanssa – kutsutaan brittilaisiin haihin, joissa heidan etainen puolisisarensa Eloise menee naimisiin. Se on tilaisuus heille yhdistya uudelleen – enemman tai vahemman – aikuisina ja oppia rakastamaan toisiaan kuten ennen.

programme.title: Amateur Night
programme.desc: Jason Biggs esittaa Guyta, palkittua, vasta valmistunutta arkkitehtia. Nyt han on kuitenkin tyoton, tuleva isa, joka etsii epatoivoisesti toita. Vaimonsa vaatimuksesta Guy vastaa netti-ilmoitukseen, jossa etsitaan ”kuljettajaa”. Guy kuvittelee toimittavansa pizzoja, mutta han huomaakin olevansa nykyaikainen sutenoori - han toimii kuskina ja sihteerina ilotytoille. Han tarvitsee rahaa, joten han tapaa Nikkin, piinkovan ja armottoman seksityontekijan, ja Nikin kaksi hulvatonta ja raavasuista kollegaa, Jaxin ja Fallonin. Guy, tuo vastentahtoinen kuski ja turvamies, paatyy rokkaavien naisten ja ressukoitten miesten maailmaan. Hurjan ja villin yon aikana, monen lahelta piti -tilanteen jalkeen,

programme.title: Dirty 30
programme.desc: Kate antaa 30-vuotispaivan aattonaan Evielle ja Charlielle luvan jarjestaa itselleen pirskeet. Juhlista sukeutuu kuitenkin menneisyytta ja nykyisyytta sekoitteleva villi peli, ja tilanne riistaytyy kaikkien kasista.

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: Undercover US Marshal John Carruthers (John Wayne) is investigating a rash of robberies by a character known as The Polka Dot Bandit in this B-movie gem. Along the way, Carruthers finds himself in more trouble than hed ever expected! Written and directed by Robert N. Bradbury, the film features George Gabby Hayes, Eleanor Hunt, and many other favorites of the era. Wayne was only 27 at the time of Blue Steel, but was well on his way to becoming The Duke.

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Oscar winner Michael Curtiz (Casablanca, Mildred Pierce) directed this exciting drama about Army officer Jeb Stuart and the days leading up to the Civil War. Errol Flynn (The Adventures of Robin Hood) stars as Stuart, with Olivia de Havilland as his romantic interest (the seventh of nine times they were paired together by Warner Bros.) The cast includes Ronald Reagan as General George Custer, and Raymond Massey as John Brown, with such familiar faces as Alan Hale and Van Hefflin in supporting roles. Filmed partly in Santa Fe!

programme.title: Riders of the Whistling Skull
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers appeared in several Republic Pictures during the 1930s, and this is considered one of their best. Its about a mysterious murder at an archeological expedition, which leads the three prairie pals into some dangerous territory. Can they solve the murder without losing their own lives? The cast includes Robert Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune, and Roger Williams, all trying to survive a hail of poison arrows and hot lead!

programme.title: The Devil Horse
programme.desc: When a boy is captured by a Native American tribe after his family is massacred, he finds solace in befriending a wild colt. Years later, following his escape, he is recaptured by a tribe who force him to battle their vicious devil horse. Yet, the horse looks familiar. Is this mysterious devil horse and the wild colt he knew years earlier one and the same? Produced by Hal Roach, who wrote the script with an assist from Stan Laurel, this little treasure was the fourth of 15 features to star Rex the Wonder Horse!

programme.title: Bulldog Courage
programme.desc: Tim McCoy, one of the unsung heroes of 1930s western pictures, stars in a dual role. First, hes Slim Braddock, a miner who turns to robbing stagecoaches after being swindled by a banker. When Slim is murdered, his son Tim, also played by McCoy, seeks vengeance. Directed by B-movie legend Sam Newfield for Excelsior Pictures, this film is a showcase for McCoy, who appeared in more than 90 movies and in 1960 earned a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame!

programme.title: Fast Bullets
programme.desc: Tom Tyler stars in this vintage western from the short-lived Reliable Pictures Company, a group known for low budgets and lots of action. In this feature, Tom reforms a gang member in order to infiltrate a ring of thieves. Rex Lease, Margaret Nearing, and Al Bridge also star.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the worlds most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Fugitive of the Plains
programme.desc: In this continuation of the much loved Billy the Kid serials featuring dreamboat Buster Crabbe (perhaps best known for his numerous appearances as Flash Gordon in the 30s and 40s), Billy finds himself joining an outlaw band led by women in order to, once again, clear his name after being wrongly accused of a crime he did not commit. Helmed by famed B-movie director Sam Newfield, this film also features Al St. John, whose lovable Fuzzy character was as essential to the PRCs Billy the Kid series as Billy himself.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: To everyones excitement, Boiler ODoul arrives in Diablo with the towns new steam fire engine. When the bank is robbed, Annie must think of a creative way to smoke out the criminals. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley

programme.title: Daniel Boone
programme.desc: In 1775, Daniel Boone (George OBrien) leads thirty colonial families to Kentucky where they face the threats of Native American marauders led by rebel Simon Girty (John Carradine). Thats just the beginning, for there are even more dangers and clashes ahead for Boone and his party. With a cast that includes Ralph Forbes, Heather Angel, and lovable child star Dickie Jones, director David Howard takes us through one of the most exciting periods in American history!

programme.title: Enemy of the Law
programme.desc: Tex Ritter stars in this western drama about a man who goes undercover to befriend a convict believed to have stolen a shipment of government gold. Also starring Guy Wilkerson as Panhandle Perkins, this offering from Hollywoods Poverty Row features the usual fistfights and entertaining storyline that made these modestly budgeted features well worth watching. Songs include Teach Me To Forget and You Will Have to Pay both sung by Tex!

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: He likes his whiskey hard... His women soft... And his west all to himself! Inspired by Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew (1594), John Wayne (The Searchers, Stagecoach), Maureen OHara (Miracle on 34th Street, The Parent Trap), and Patrick Wayne (The Searchers, The Alamo) star in this western comedy directed by Andrew V. McLaglen (Gunsmoke, The Wild Geese). George Washington McLintock (John Wayne) is the wealthiest man in his territory who utilizes his power and influence to maintain order between farmers, ranchers, Indians, corrupt government officials, and his own family! McLintock is McNificent!

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: An unholy alliance! Marking the feature film debut of one of Hollywoods most influential and widely referenced auteur directors, Sam Peckinpah, The Deadly Companions centers on a redemptive journey to escort a funeral procession through dangerous Indian Territory. Featuring fine work from a top-notch cast that includes the inimitable Maureen OHara at the height of her illustrious career, Peckinpahs first foray into film provides a promising glance into the energetic and violent nature of his iconic later works.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: A love story and a search for gold in the Valley of Death! Dubbed simple, powerful and dramatic by the New York Times on the date of its release, Death Valley is indeed an elegant depiction of love and deception in the American desert during the Gold Rush. In what was to be the final film of famed silent film director Paul Powell (Polyanna), a cast of mostly unknown actors produces uniformly excellent work. Lyrical and graceful, Powells film spins the tale of a young boy who finds love and gold, only to have it stolen from him.

programme.title: Call of the Forest
programme.desc: Theres plenty of drama in this tale of lost gold mines, gallant stallions, and fuzzy bears. Starring Ken Curtis, Robert Lowery, and Chief Thundercloud, this charming little film is highlighted by Karl Struss stunning photography

programme.title: Hawk of the Hills
programme.desc: A band of Indians led by the Hawk terrorizes prospectors in a valley. HAWK OF THE HILLS was originally released as a ten episode serial in 1927 but was re-edited into a five-reel feature (the version presented here) in 1929.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Revenge of the Virgins (Edited Version)
programme.desc: The angry and topless female members of a Native American prepare for battle when white treasure hunters move in on their sacred ground. Peter Perry Jr. (The Secret Sex Lives of Romeo and Juliet) directed this early nudie-cutie from a script by legendary cult filmmaker Ed Wood (Plan Nine from Outer Space). Writing under the pen name Peter LaRoche, Wood churned out this screenplay just before he reinvented himself as the author of seedy adult novels.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In this episode, the scourge of the Southwest is a ruthless and devious killer known as the Sidewinder. When a hapless Cavalryman escorting the criminal falls victim to his tricks, Pat and Sonny set out to track him down and bring him in. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. This episode, Stolen Dynamite, stars Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the G-men nab a beautiful spy.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Bobbie Jo and the Beatnik
programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls head over heals for an edgy young poet from New York. He likes her, too, but hes not fond of Hooterville. Of coure, Kate has to show Bobby Jo what this pompous fool is all about. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963. Look for Dennis Hopper as the beatnik.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 My Daughter the Doctor
programme.desc: The family wants Billie Jo to become a doctor, but she wants to go to Hollywood to become an actress. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. And be sure to look for Adam West in a pre-Batman role as Doctor Clayton Harris. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in January, 1964.

Also starring Mary Castle. Donald Curtis, Emlen Davis, Lee Roberts, Harry Lauter, and Ralph Sanford. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired March 4, 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, one of Judge Beans friends is forced to translate a map by two outlaws. They stole the item from Chinese miners and the Judge must save his pal without endangering his life. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West.In this episode, Judge Bean suspects that Doc Malones Medicine Show may be harboring a notorious killer. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley

This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A man returns home to find that his family has been murdered in a Huron raid.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye goes up against a crew of pirates when they kidnap two women.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright unknowingly hires outlaw Johnny Logan to help him with his cattle drive. Logan, going by the name Sam Jackson, joined with a plan to kill the sheriff of a nearby town.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Under Western Stars
programme.desc: Roy Rogers debuts in his starring role as the likable cowboy sent to Congress with a mission: let Washington know about the suffering of farmers in the wake of Americas 1930s Dustbowl. Enjoy the singing cowboy in his first starring role, rubbing shoulder with politians, going up against greedy executives, and representing a whole people group youll see why Rogers became a national icon! Frog Millhouse: Smiley Burnett. Elanore Fairbanks: Carol Hughes. John Fairbanks: Guy Usher. Plus music and singing from the Maple City Four. (The song Dust was nominated for an Academy Award!) Directed by Joe Kane.

programme.title: Bells of San Angelo
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Dale Evans team up in this tale of silver mines, kidnappings, and secret passages. Roy plays a border guard who has to rescue Dale from the clutches of underhanded miner Rex Gridley (John McGuire). How does he do it? With help from Trigger, of course! With a cast that inclues Andy Devine as Sheriff Cookie Bullfincer, director William Witney gives us an enjoyable drama from the golden era of Republic Pictures!

programme.title: Daniel Boone, Trailblazer
programme.desc: Daniel Boone (Bruce Bennett) battles Shawnee warriors as he leads a band of settlers into Kentucky in this frontier potboiler from Albert C. Gannaway Productions. Made at the height of Hollywoods fascination with pioneer days, the film also stars Lon Chaney Jr. as Chief Blackfish, and country singer Faron Young as a handsome young suitor for Boones daughter. Theres plenty of action and danger here as the Shawnee are convinced that Boone is trying to steal their land. But Boone is ready, not even fearing death by tomahawk. It isnt how you die, Boone says. Its what you live for.

programme.title: Kentucky Rifle
programme.desc: His Wits, Weapons and Women, Turned Defeat Into Victory! A man brings a wagonload of Kentucky rifles through Indian Territory. Unfortunately the Indians realize what he has and offer the travelers an ultimatum: the rifles or their lives! Starring Lance Fuller, Sterling Holloway, Henry Hull, Chill Wills, Cathy Downs, and Jeanne Cagney, plus one of the great B-Western heels, I. Stanford Jolley!

programme.title: Hell Town
programme.desc: In Hell Town (aka Born to the West) John Wayne is back in the saddle as two-fisted Dare Rudd, a roaming cowhand trying to prove he can win a womans love and outwit a crooked saloon owner. This exciting B-movie from Paramount Pictures was based on a novel by western writer Zane Grey. With a wild and wooly cast that includes Johnny Mack Brown, Marsha Hunt, Monte Blue, and Lucian Littlefield, director Charles Barton (Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein) gives us a tale of romance, action, and high stakes gambling!

programme.title: Between Men
programme.desc: When his young son is shot, John Wellington kills the culprit and flees. But his son Johnny recovers and is raised by Sir George. Some twenty years later Johnny sets out to find Sir Georges missing granddaughter. He finds her and also finds Rand, but neither of the two men realize they are father and son.

programme.title: The Legend of the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The Butch Cavendish gang ambushes a group of Texas Rangers, killing all but one. The surviving ranger is nursed back to health by Native American Tonto, and takes on the identity of a masked vigilante, determined to bring all outlaws to justice. Culled from episodes of the popular TV series, this feature is great fun for fans of the Lone Ranger. Starring Clayton Moore and Jay Silverheels.

programme.title: Carbon Fibre vs Liveries - What F1 Needs to Bring Colour Back
programme.desc: F1s 2024 season may have kicked off, but during the pre-season events, bare carbon fibre kept catching our eyes. It was an interesting novelty a few years ago, but in 2024, fans are missing the bright, colourful paint schemes of previous years. To understand more, Jon Noble chatted with Mark Turner, Co-Founder and CEO of Silverstone Paint Technology, who works with the majority of the F1 grid, to find out more.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean is feeling down when everyone forgot his birthday.

programme.desc: The airport personnel refuses to let Mr. Bean take a flight due to his passport having no photo.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean needs to learn to dance to impress his girlfriend Irma.

programme.title: Bean Shopping
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is locked in a department store overnight having the time of his life.

programme.title: Game Over
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wicket’s nephew.

programme.title: Special Delivery
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: The Big Stink
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor.

programme.title: Birthday Bother

programme.title: Bed Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he can’t.

programme.title: Spa Day
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat.

programme.title: Charity Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan.

programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert.

programme.title: Mobile Home
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind.

programme.title: Haunted House
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills.

programme.title: Eau De Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wicket’s new, expensive perfume on the floor.

programme.title: Running On Empty
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol.

programme.title: Bean Bug
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas, and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person.

programme.title: Coffee Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winter’s morning to discover that the boiler is broken.

programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesn’t. It’s too expensive.

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irma’s Mum, at all costs.

programme.title: Save That Tree
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down.

programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale.

programme.title: Jumping Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try.

programme.title: Cat Chaos
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing.

programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wicket’s nephew and Bruiser Jnr swopping football stickers.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks he’s just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden.

programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket’s Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean decides to become a wildlife photographer.

programme.desc: Mr Bean cant find a parking space. So he makes one of his own.

programme.desc: Whilst digging for buried treasure, Mr Bean digs himself a hole too deep to get out of.

programme.desc: Bean fights a loosing battle with a winged beast from Hell.

programme.desc: Mr Bean finds that cleanliness can be a filthy business.

programme.desc: His landlady smells a fish when Mr Bean gets a bird.

programme.desc: Sunbathing proves a more strenuous pursuit for Mr Bean.

programme.desc: Mr Bean forgets his teddy’s Birthday - then gives him a treat to remember.

programme.desc: Mr Bean loses control of a pest and makes a mountain out of a molehill.

programme.desc: Mr Bean is driven to distraction by diabolical decibels.

programme.desc: Mr Bean finds himself with more than a spring in his step.

programme.desc: A puzzling puzzle has Mr Bean truly puzzled.

programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to let a room but no one will let him.

programme.desc: Mr Bean discovers the great outdoors is not always so great.

programme.desc: Mr Bean’s hobby goes down in flames in his battle for air supremacy.

programme.desc: Mr Bean takes a trip down Memory Lane.

programme.desc: Mr Bean, badgered by a strange pink animal, warms to the creature when it shows its true colours.

programme.desc: Mr Bean has a bad hair day.

programme.desc: Mr Bean discovers being in hospital isnt always a bed of roses.

programme.title: Dice
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Denrele Bada is a popular actor in Nollywood, known for his method acting. One strange night, Bada kills his girlfriend of 4 months and he strangely confesses to it. Yomi Taiwo is the state prosecutor determined to nail Bada for the chair. While investigating the case, Yomi discovers that Bada usually takes his characters home but this time, Badas latest character was a murderer sent to kill his girlfriend. What must Yomi do?

programme.title: Pressured
programme.desc: A woman is regarded as a spinster after a series of failed romances and feeling pressure from all around her to settle down with the next man that comes along.

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. An Uber driver picks up a female passenger who has stolen a large sum of money from a rich psychopath. When he realizes this, he must decide whether to turn her in or become an accomplice as he soon starts to like her.

programme.title: Unforgotten
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. On the third anniversary of her husband’s death, a widow receives a strange visitor who reveals some hidden secrets surrounding her late husband and demands something from her which her husband owed – something she is willing to lay down her life for.

programme.title: A Second Chance at Love
programme.desc: 11 years after his heart is broken by Mercy, Bryan runs into her when he comes back to Lagos after being abroad for his studies. They begin to rekindle their relationship until a huge secret kept by Mercy threatens to tear apart the very fabric of their love, but can love conquer all?

programme.title: Wild Wild Bayo
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Adeline gets the shock of her life when she is dumped by Kunle without reason. She soon finds out that he has been cheating on her with two other women and is getting married to the daughter of a billionaire. She decides to team up with the other women a few days before his wedding to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: Besotted
programme.desc: Besotted revolves around Rita who seems to be fooled by what she thought was love for her boyfriend Michael, only for her to find out that he squandered her money on illegal activities. This leaves Rita devastated, she tries to turn him over to the police but the unexpected happens.

programme.title: Imperfection
programme.desc: A man struggles to deal with a nagging wife while she also finds difficulty keeping up with his nonchalance. But a balance must be struck if theyll make marriage a success.

programme.title: The Missing Package
programme.desc: In The Missing Package, Detective Lazarus is almost done for the day when an unassuming middle-aged man walks in and reports a package he is expecting missing, but more importantly is the carrier who seems to have disappeared into thin air. This sets Detective Lazarus on a wild goose chase to find what appears to be a package determined not to be found and a carrier who appears to no longer exist.

programme.title: Bitter Love
programme.desc: Jordan, a notorious playboy is faced with an unexpected ultimatum. To claim his inheritance, he must do the one thing he swore he’d never do, get married. Forced to trade his bachelor antics for a life of commitment, Jordan scrambles to find the perfect partner but soon realises that love, and marriage, isn’t as simple as sealing a deal.

programme.title: Her Flatmate
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When Rekia moves in with Kiki, they are on their way to becoming fast friends until Mabel, Rekia’s best friend, comes visiting and suddenly Kiki finds herself living with a devil in disguise.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. In a bid to find love, plus sized Tobi, decides to slide into the DM’s of her crush, Mofe, using the picture of her slimmer friend, Sharon. Things get complicated when Mofe wants to meet up with Tobi in person.

programme.title: We Did It For Love
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A desperate guy down on his luck deceitfully takes a loan from a loan shark to secure a future with his soul mate, a decision he soon regrets.

programme.title: Game Change
programme.desc: A group of four friends who just recently graduated sort out their quest for the big money by carrying out a ponzi scheme. The success of the first one urges them to carry out another one. But this time, nothing goes as planned.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep5
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep6
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep7
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep8
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: Check-Mate
programme.desc: Jada, suspicious about her husbands reason for always being tired, decides to hire an escort to test his fidelity. Things dont go according to plan, and she puts their relationship into jeopardy.

programme.title: Entangled
programme.desc: A once happy marriage starts to face crisis when the hunsband is promoted and starts having more responsibility at work, leaving his wife to believe he is now neglecting his family responsibilities.

programme.title: Burning Pain
programme.desc: After his wife becomes sick and unable to move properly, Michael takes on the extra responsibility of caring for her. Is he doing this out of the goodness of his heart or is there something nefarious going on behind close doors?

programme.title: AMC Music Moments - Playlist 464
programme.desc: AMC presents music from the latest African artists.

programme.title: A Fight For Love
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. After Amaka is given six months to live, she is abandoned by her husband. With nothing left to lose, she leaves her home and moves to Lagos, deciding to live her life to the fullest where she falls in love with Onyebuchi. Things come to a head when she realises that she has been lied to by her doctor and her husband comes back into the picture, wanting to fight for his wife.

programme.title: Dice
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Denrele Bada is a popular actor in Nollywood, known for his method acting. One strange night, Bada kills his girlfriend of 4 months and he strangely confesses to it. Yomi Taiwo is the state prosecutor determined to nail Bada for the chair. While investigating the case, Yomi discovers that Bada usually takes his characters home but this time, Badas latest character was a murderer sent to kill his girlfriend. What must Yomi do?

programme.title: Officer No.7
programme.desc: When the only son of a middle-aged widow is killed by roadside policemen looking for a bribe, policemen begin to fall like flies with no known cause of death, leading the concerned DPO to invite the assistance of the crime investigation department who send in one of their foremost detectives as more bodies drop.

programme.title: Satisfy Me
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Satisfy Me follows the life of a lady in her late thirties who wants to settle down by any means, which leads her into marrying a man with narcissistic personality disorder. She loses herself trying to boost his ego, not realising he is mentally unstable until it becomes too late.

programme.title: Becoming Mrs Eze
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When Tatiana accepts Ezes marriage proposal, her friends and family believe she has chosen wrong due to the fact that he is considered unrefined and broke, and Ezes family believe that Tatiana is a city girl that is not good enough for him. Will Tatiana and Ezes love be strong enough to withstand all the judgement?

programme.title: Humble Pie
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A down-on-their luck couple turn to a life of crime, calling themselves Bonnie and Clyde, when the man loses his job due to unfortunate circumstances. Their crimes lead them to a bickering couple, Eric and Zara, and the chance meeting has everyone re-evaluating their actions.

programme.title: Wrongfully Hers
programme.desc: Hijinks follows after Perpetual, pretending to be a sophisticated socialite, befriends Gina who has fallen in love with Esa, not realising he is Perpetuals unappreciated boyfriend.

programme.title: Kill Fred
programme.desc: Out for revenge, Rose, plots to kill her husband, Fred, with the help of her lover, Vic, not realising Vic has his own reasons for wanting Fred dead.

programme.title: Imperfection
programme.desc: A man struggles to deal with a nagging wife while she also finds difficulty keeping up with his nonchalance. But a balance must be struck if theyll make marriage a success.

programme.title: Bitter Love
programme.desc: Jordan, a notorious playboy is faced with an unexpected ultimatum. To claim his inheritance, he must do the one thing he swore he’d never do, get married. Forced to trade his bachelor antics for a life of commitment, Jordan scrambles to find the perfect partner but soon realises that love, and marriage, isn’t as simple as sealing a deal.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharps One Hit Wonders! 70-79
programme.desc: They all had 1 massive song, then never skirted the UK Top 20 singles chart again! Pat has 40 acts from every year of the 70s, in order, who all achieved their 15 minutes of fame.

programme.desc: 60 minutes of power pop and rock! Earplugs at the ready as we rewind to 1976 with Genesis, Thin Lizzy, Peter Frampton and The Sex Pistols!

programme.desc: Seventies music power to play loud! Work out your speakers with some pure power pop and rock including Undertones, Elton, and The Who!
